Her hand swooped down and lifted him up before he could say a word and he was brought right in front of her face. “Call me Jubilee, everyone calls me that.”

“N-nice t-to meet you Ju-jubilee,” Jason stuttered as he weakly smiled back. He felt like such a dork right now, he hoped he didn’t act this way around the other X-Men girls or he was going to be labeled a dweeb by everyone.

Jubilee walked out of Professor X’s office with Jason in her hand, lightly bouncing in her palm as she took slowly steady steps. She glanced down at him as he timidly tried remaining still in her hand. Jubilee smiled down at the tiny new student, usually she didn’t like showing new arrivals around but something about the tiny mutant was kind of cute. When she felt him squirm in her hand, it felt so strange knowing that it was a living person. He seemed so in awe of everything around him as he turned his tiny little head around. He wasn’t talking to her, probably too scared by the new environment and that just made him seem even cuter. She knew he was a person, but the way he was acting reminded her so much of how some adorable tiny pet would react.

“Where are we going first?” Jason finally managed to ask as he turned his tiny curious eyes up to Jubilee’s face. Se smiled sweetly down at him and he felt his heart melt when he saw those sparking white teeth shine at him.

“Fantastic, just freaking fantastic,” grumbled a young blond boy as he sat on the ground shaking his head and wondering what he was going to do. At the tender age of thirteen, he had seen and done nearly everything, but he had never been in a situation like this before. A few minutes ago, he had snuck into his father’s lab to see what new inventions he had come up with. When he entered the lab, the lights had been turned off and in his haste to find the light switch had accidentally activated his father’s latest invention, a shrink ray. The thing had gone off and now he was sitting dazed on the floor, just a tiny speck.

“Dad is going to kill me for this,” Franklin groaned at the thought of his father finding out he had been in his lab. Being caught worried Franklin, not his tiny situation. Just from looking around at his surroundings, he could tell that he had shrunken down to about an inch. The table’s legs looked like skyscrapers, dust bunnies were the size of tumbleweeds, and he couldn’t see from one end of the lab to the other. But he wasn’t worried.

“I hope mom doesn’t find me. Dad will only give me a strict talking to, but mom will hit the roof.” Being the son of two super heroes left Franklin with little freedom, yet little actual parenting. His parents forced him to come home right after school, tell them about everyone he meets and always have a guardian with him when he left home. If that wasn’t bad enough, his parents were out being heroes all the time, saving the world and so forth, and Franklin was left at home with his little sister Valerie and his robot nanny H.E.R.B.I.E.

He had expected H.E.R.B.I.E to show up and return him to normal by now, but he was surprised to find that the tin can was nowhere to be seen. With a growing smile, Franklin realized the robot had no idea what had happened and no one was aware what had happened to him. Most people would start freaking out, but for someone that spent most of their life cooped up, this wasn’t a problem, this was an adventure.

“I’M SHRUNK!” Franklin screamed and then started laughing. He thought of all the fun he could have running around the building no bigger then a bug. He could get into all the places he could never go and explore a world so alien at his current size. Sure, he knew there could be a little danger, but he confident that he could manage. “It started with a flash in the sky, and a ripple through the clouds. Nobody knows what caused it exactly, but the Avengers were the first on the scene. “So Reed, Stark, Professor X, and all the other big brains were called in to address and hopefully contain the situation, but they soon found the latter to be impossible. In that one, every single person without a Y-Chromosome and with powers were all going through the same thing. Heck, even some of them who didn’t have any powers went through the same thing, which confused everybody even more. Naturally this made everyone pretty nervous, but then the girls came to our meeting and told us their side of the story.”

“They pleaded with everyone not to cast them out or try to lock them away, saying they were still the same heroes we all know and love. In fact, I was actually the one to then point out that what ever caused this thing also brings back good people when eaten, just not villains. I saw plenty of murmuring going on amongst the girls, but meanwhile Lilandra once more begged for her sister, stating that what had happened to her had completely changed her. It was then that everyone agreed how much we loved this change.”

“Sure there was the question on whether it was right to digest and kill someone, heck even I asked myself that, but now, honestly things have never been better. Crime is going down everyday, the girls have never been happier, and certain folks like, well we’re benefitting in another way to. Hey look, Nickelback!”

"Quentin Beck?"

The courtroom was hushed as all eyes fixated towards the man in the chair next to the wooden table. Dabbling with what appeared to be two small marbles in his hand, he stood up from his chair.

"Yes?"

"This court charges you with possession and distribution of class 1 metahuman altering substances, commonly known as the "F" pills, with an estimated value of $150 million dollars. How do you plead?"

"Not guilty."

Rumbles in the courtroom followed as the man better known as Mysterio took his seat, staring at the judge with a toothy grin, the same look as an alligator and about half as inviting. The only person who wasn't gasping was his lawyer, Jennifer Walters. Like Beck, she too had a dual identity, but her alter-ego, the Sensational She-Hulk, was considered far more noble than the criminal Mysterio.

"Are you really sure you want to go through with this?" Walters asked her client.

"I hired you as my attorney because you were the best in New York. Your job is to prove my innocence, correct?"

"No, my job is to minimize the legal repercussions you face. I don't know if we can do that considering the evidence. And are you sure I'm the first lawyer you went to?"

*********************************************************

You're lying to my face! And the charges are obscene! I'll have no part of this spectacle!

Mr. Murdock, if you won't represent me, will you at least recommend me someone who will?

*Sigh* That I can do.

*********************************************************

"Of course Ms. Walters."

"Ladies and gentlemen," the prosecutor began as he stared at both Beck and Walters, "the man before you, the costumed criminal known as Mysterio, was not only storing vast amounts of a dangerous, life threatening drug that gives humans metahuman powers, but also selling it at tremendous profit to himself."

Beck once again said nothing, watching merely as his attorney stood up. As she did so, the two small marbles in his hand fell into the water pitcher on the table, dissolving instantly.

"Your honor, my client has renounced his life of crime, but yet continues to be harassed, both by the police and the costumed vigilante known as Spider-Man. The police in fact, found the substances in question in a building Mr. Beck was sharing, and one he was defending from Spider-Man when he invaded. My client has nothing to do with the drugs found."

Sitting down, Jennifer just looked at Quentin, still wearing the same toothy grin. Immediately, she poured herself a full glass of water and chugged it down.

"You seem worried."

"Only because everyone thinks you're a liar."

"The prosecution calls Quentin Beck to the stand," the prosecutor interrupted. Without so much as a word, Beck stood up and took his seat at the witness stand.

"Mr. Beck, are you aware of what these are?" the prosecutor began, holding a bag full of white pills, each one perfectly round.

"Your morning vitamins?" Beck answered, elicting a laugh.

"No, these are the four types of "F", or fetish pills, found in the studio you were renting when the police came in.

"Without a warrant..."

"Because of reports of violence!"

"I was defending my area of work from that insufferable arachnid prowler! If some animal-themed invader went into your workspace, you'd fight back too!"

"OBJECTION!" Jennifer shouted. "This is irrelevant to the drugs in question."

"Very well," the prosecutor answered, pausing for a moment before continuing. "The four types of pills we have here are "CV", which causes the human body to...well, erm..."

"What's the matter? Embarassed?" Beck taunted.

"NO! CV causes the human body to become voracious, able to expand its mouth to eat an entire human! GT causes the body to expand to various degrees depending on the dosage, while SP causes it to reduce in size! And then finally we have U...which apparently only works on females..."

"You sound turned on," Beck continued. "Does someone need a girlfriend?"

"Mr. Beck, you're out of order!" the judge roared, his bald head shining in the room. "One more outburst like that and you will be escorted from the courtroom!"

"Fine, Your Honor."

"My point being," the prosecutor concluded, is that...

Everyone in the courtroom suddenly stopped in their tracks as they looked towards the defense's table. Jennifer Walters was hunched over, as if in extreme pain.

"Ms. Walters!"

"You see! I'm innocent! Someone's poisoned my attorney!"

The crowd in the courtroom could only watch as Jennifer Walters looked towards the roof, beginning her change, her skin turning green and her clothes ripping, revealing a one-piece spandex suit underneath.

"My God!" Beck shouted. "What was in that water?"

“What is happening?!” Quentin Beck Gasped loud enough for everyone to hear how shocked he was by the unexpected drugging of his attorney.

While Beck pretend to be surprised, he was already thinking of what he was going to do first when he got out of prison. Poisoning his attorney was a stroke of genius, worthy of the master of deception, Mysterio. She gets poisoned, he claims someone’s out to get him, he gets off scot-free under the pretense that he’s an innocent man that’s being targeted. Maybe he could even go into witness protection and get a new home and identity for free. He was certainly going to leave New York after he got out, too many pesky super heroes ruining his market.

“Someone call an ambulance!” Beck cried out in fake concern for his attorney. Jennifer had fallen to one knee as her transformation completed itself, turning the tame lawyer into an amazon sized green hero. She took hard, wheezing breathes as the drugs took effect of her gamma radiation enhanced body. With her vision hazy, she stared angrily at Beck.

“You did this!” She hissed loudly as pain ruptured through her body. It felt like her insides were being twisted around, she’d felt worse before, but it still hurt a lot.

“What are you talking about?”

Not buying the innocent act, the now fully transformed She-Hulk rose to her full height, putting her several feet above Beck. “I know it was you. Only someone as sick and twisted as you could poison their own lawyer.”

“Tut tut Ms. Walters, as a lawyer you should know that jumping to conclusions isn’t smart. You need evidence, witnesses and a motive. Now please calm down, your shaking,” Beck civilly said as he stared up without a hint of fear at the emerald amazon. He wasn’t worried, everyone knew he could of done this, but no one could prove he had done it. He may have put the drug in Jennifer’s water; the prosecution might have also dropped it in, or the person sitting behind them. For all it mattered, Jennifer could have drugged herself by accidence. This was what Beck loved about the court system; no one sees you and you can get away with anything.

“Ms. Walters, you really should sit down. You’re shaking very violently,” the judge said as the courtroom started to settle down.

“No, not yet,” She-Hulk growled as she narrowed her eyes at her client. It was getting harder to think as the drug took full effect, she wasn’t sure what she had been tricked into taking, but it was making it hard to think. As her mind started to become muddled, one thought pushed through the haze. She was very hungry.

“You…Little…Stupid…. Delicious…Man,” She-Hulk grunted as she grabbed Beck by the collar. She lifted him up easily, bringing her closer to her face. As he came face to face with her, his scent filled She-Hulk’s nose and her mouth started watering. All she could think about was how hungrily she was and how good the criminal dangling in front of her looked.

“What did you say?” Beck squeaked as all his unflappable behavior vanished. For the first time today, he thought he might have made a huge mistake.

Slamming her gavel down, the judge screamed at She-Hulk. “Ms. Walters! Put your client down this….”

The judge never finished that sentence because like everyone else in the court room she was left speechless as the Sensational She-Hulk opened her mouth impossible wide and pushed Beck’s head into her gapping maw. There are few cities in America more dark and gloomy then Gotham city. Over the last few years, the city has faced a plague, earthquake and being all but abandoned by the United States, but had still managed to live on. It hasn’t been easy with the wide range of super villains running around. Most are locked up in Arkham asylum, but they could escape at any time. Gotham would crumble and everyone living there would fall into darkness if not for one man. To his enemies, he is no man, but a force for justice. He is the Batman and tonight he stands on the rooftop across from the first Gotham bank watching below, as a crime is about to take place.

“I can’t tell, is that the Calendar Man standing outside the bank?” Batman turned to his partner and adopted son Time Drake Wayne. Over the last few years, many things had happened to the young ward. He had lost his father, become leader of the latest incarnation of the Teen Titans and grown from an adventurous boy to a courageous man. If Batman were less of a stoic man, he would tell his adopted son how proud he was of him. Instead, he gazed down at the figure in front of the bank with a dark sneer.

“No, that isn’t the Calendar Man,” Batman said in a grainy sharp voice. “He goes by the name Sizer and is the latest super villain to arrive in Gotham. He’s been robbing banks all over Gotham by shrinking the whole building and walking away with it to loot later.”
“He shrinks the building, huh,” Robin muttered as he watched the seemingly weak man strut around the bank. Shrinking whole buildings was a new one for Robin.

“Apparently, he stole a shrink ray prototype from Ray Palmer lab and has been using it to commit his crimes. We need to get the shrink ray away from him before he can use it again. Are you ready?” Batman said as he prepared to leap down and confront the crook. Everything was simple to Batman, go down, take the shrink ray and defeat the villain with one blow. It was going to be a simple job that wouldn’t take very long.

“I’m always ready,” Robin smirked and readied his grappling hook. Batman didn’t return the smirk and just moved, leaping from the building he landed in a crouch with Robin right behind him. He must have made a sound because as he landed the Sizer spun around to face him.

“Oh no, oh no, oh no,” whimpered the Sizer as he saw the Batman for the first time. The Sizer was a rookie super villain, but even he knew to fear the Batman. Stories of the caped crusader were on the lips of anyone who broke the law in Gotham and they all ended the same, in jail or in traction. The size shakily pointed his shrink ray at Batman, sweating heavily as he tried to keep his arm still.

“Give up,” Batman growled, his batarange shimmering in his right hand. The Sizer shook his head slowly; he was terrified, but not so much that he was going to walk away peacefully. Batman snorted, if the Sizer wanted to play then lets play. He could try to knock the ray gun from his hand with his batarange, but the Sizer might still manage to get off a shot.

Out of the corner of his eye, Batman spotted Robin hiding in the shadows. He had gone around Batman when he jumped off the building to get a better possession to the side of the villain. Robin was now in perfect position to sideline the villain and grab the ray gun.

Everything would of worked perfectly, the Sizer would have been taken down and the shrink ray returned to Ray Palmer’s lab. If Batman had taken into consideration how fast and quietly the shrink ray fired. Robin was a few feet away from the Sizer when he fired. The Sizer hadn’t even seen Robin when he fired, he had gone off early out of panic. The gun fired out an erratic beam of light. His shaking caused the beam to go wide, accidentally striking….

Batman grit his teeth as the beam impacted his chest, less out of any physical pain that it caused and more in anticipation of the effect that the beam would have. His momentum kept him moving forward for a few seconds, during that time he began to rapidly shrink in size with each step- losing inches, then feet, until he was only a paltry six inches in height. His widened eyes at the realization that he had been shrunk in such a short amount of time matched the Sizer's as he stared at the shrunken vigilante.

"Batman!" Robin cried out, startling the super-villain who quickly whirled around, aiming his stolen weapon at the sidekick. Robin dodged to the side as the Sizer fired his ray, causing it to hit a dumpster instead; he rolled under another beam, and leapt to avoid the weapon's changing arc as the Sizer moved to follow him. Meanwhile, Batman was dashing towards the side of the alleyway, trying to avoid the footfalls of the two giants.

Robin quickly aimed one of his signature R-shaped shurikens at the villain's hands, making the Sizer shout in surprise, dropping the weapon as he cradled the cut on his hand. However, instead of turning off the beam continued to fire for a few seconds, wildly thrashing about like a fire hose as it indiscriminately fired. Robin was struck by a beam, soon shrinking down in size like his mentor, as was the Sizer. A garbage can was struck as well, but the worst was yet to come as the beam hit an exposed water pipe on the side of one of the nearby buildings. The pipe burst as the water pressure became too much for it, send a pressurized stream over the small costumed figures, which rapidly washed them out of the alleyway and into the gutter.

Batman retrieved a rebreather on his belt just in time for the wave to hit, sending him sprawling as he tried to find something to hold onto. Grabbing onto a crack in the road, he summoned all his willpower and strength as he clung to the asphalt. Looking back, he saw both Robin- wearing his own rebreather- and the Sizer get swept away in the flood to locations unknown. Grimacing, he could only weather the tide and hope that his sidekick's training wouldn't fail him at his reduced height.

Once the water stopped, he quickly took off his rebreather and activated the communicator built into his mask, calling Barbara Gordon- the former Batgirl and current Oracle. "Oracle, this is Batman," he spoke, "Robin and I encountered the Sizer but were shrunk down in size. Robin and the Sizer were swept away by a stream of water; can you get a read on Robin's locator?"

"On it," Barbara replied. Bruce could hear tapping coming from the other end of the connection as Oracle brought up the relevant program. "That's odd... I don't see either of you. Hold on..." Another round of typing as Barbara looked for any problems on her end. "Sorry, I'm not seeing anything."

Batman shook his head. "Unfortunately, I think it's too dangerous for me to be running around at this height. Can you send Cassandra to pick me up and get Stephanie and your team to search for Robin? Hopefully he'll call you soon, but we might need to track down the Sizer anyways. Cassandra can take me to Dr. Palmer's lab in the meantime."

"Right. I'll call the girls and get everything in order. I'll call Dr. Palmer too."

"Thank you." Batman gave Oracle his location, then hung up. Using his grappling hook, he repelled out of the gutter and onto the sidewalk, quickly walking to the side of a building so as to stay out of the path of any late-night walkers. While he waited, he checked his gear to find that most of his electrical gadgets were completely useless, either due to being shrunken down or the water- or a combination of both. His suit had been spared, yet it seemed that some things, like his tracker, had been damaged anyways. Letting out a rare sigh, Batman began to lean against the wall.

---

Just a few blocks away, Robin was in a similar situation. Having narrowly avoided a sewage drain, he was now catching his breath on the sidewalk. He didn't know where the Sizer was- he had either been swept further away than he had, or had ended up in the sewer like Robin almost did. Either one meant that he was effectively out of reach of the Boy Wonder now.

Suddenly, his phone began to buzz. Quickly retrieving it from his utility belt, he was glad to see that it was a call from Oracle. Putting the phone to his ear, he gave a short "Hello?"

"T- Batman- shrunk, he's- away. Just stay- come find you."

"What? I'm sorry, you're not coming through clearly."

"Wh- Can't hear- so just fo- training. Stay safe, Robin." With that, Oracle ended the call. Robin folded his arms, letting out a huff of frustration as he looked around, kicking a miniscule piece of gravel away as he waited as Barbara had instructed.

---

Unbeknownst to either of the two crime-fighters, a third party had been watching their scuffle with Sizer. More specifically, Harley Quinn- her jester outfit barely concealed by a tan trench-coat- had heard the ruckus and decided to check things out. After frantically taking cover as the Sizer's weapon went out of control, she cautiously approached the discarded gun. Picking it up gingerly, she cautiously looked around before stowing it away underneath her coat, a small grin slowly widening on her face. "This is gonna be so much fun!" she sang, skipping down the alleyway before some other costumed person could take away her new prize.

"Say, maybe I ought to have you as a topping bird brain!"

Tim gave her a quizzical look, which prompted another round of laughter from the jester.

"Nah, I'm just kidding. Let's see what they have to eat in this joint... besides you, of course!"

Tim groaned as Harley walked towards the makeshift kitchen. He could only hope that Batman and Wonder Woman were fairing better than he was.
1223122.title: Robin gets caught by the Mysterious Amazon!

choices: Harley swallows him accidentally, but retrieves him
12231221.content:
When Harley got to the kitchen, she began to fiddle with Tim's utility belt, trying to pull it off. "Grr, c'mon..." she said, her massive fingers trying to get a grip on the miniscule belt. "Hey, Robbie, mind giving me a hand with your belt?"

"Why on earth would I do that?" Tim challenged.

"Yeah, you're right. I'll go find a knife..."

Tim immediately undid his belt, and Harley Quinn snatched it up with a smile. "Thanks, Rob, you're the best!" she chirped, "I couldn't have you trying to use your grappling gun or your smoke bombs or your boomerangs or any of your other gadgets to try and escape, now could I?"

"I guess not," Tim replied grudgingly.

"Aw, cheer up Robbie," Harley said, stroking his hair, "since you're being such a good boy, I'll share my snack with you!" She set him down on the counter, and began to pull ingredients out of the cupboards and fridge. "Bread, bologna, ham, cheese, lettuce, tomato, mustard... yep, looks like we've got all the makings of a hero sandwich!" Harley looked at Tim out of the corner of her eye. "No pun intended."

Tim watched as Harley began to assemble her sandwich, looking around the countertop and the kitchen for any avenue of escape. There was none; the sheer drop to the ground, if it didn't kill him outright, would surely break every bone in his body. There was no safe way down, either; the drawers were too sheer to get a grip on unless they were open, and they weren't, and even then he'd have to risk a tremendous fall to the ground if he got to the bottom drawer. It was almost as if it was designed to keep him there...

"Okay, it's done. Too bad they didn't have any olives or toothpicks though..." Tim looked back towards Harley Quinn, as well as the submarine sandwich she had constructed that, to him, was bigger than a train. Harley picked him up, bringing him back up to her face once more. "Now, what's the best way to give you some..."

"It's fine Harley, I'm not hungry." Truthfully, he was a little bit, but he didn't want to risk Harley doing something like adding him to the sandwich.

"Nonsense! You're a growing boy, and as my pet it's my responsibility to make sure you stay fed!"

"...okay, just break off a small piece of bread then."

"You got it!" Harley put Tim on her plate, and carried him over to the table. She sat down, broke a piece of bread off her sandwich- that was almost the size of Tim's body- and placed it on his lap, before digging in to her own meal. Tim watched with a mixture of curiosity and revulsion as she scarfed down her sandwich; it was interesting to watch someone eat from this angle, but the thought occurred to him as she took bites out of her lunch that he would fit down her throat just as easily. Shaking the morbid thought off, he continued to watch Harley eat, taking a few bites out of his bread as well. As he watched her throat bob as she swallowed the latest bite of her sandwich, he was startled to see Harley look at him with a grin on her face. "Like what ya see?"

"I- uh," Tim started, as Harley shoved the last bit of her sandwich in her hungry, salivating maw. She chewed a few times, mashing it between her teeth, then leaned forward, opening her mouth wide to show Tim the masticated mess.

"Ahh..." Her hot breath washed over Tim, thick with the scent of her recent meal. He watched as Harley Quinn moved her tongue, maneuvering the last of her meal into the entrance of her throat. Tim couldn't take his eyes off of the display as Harley swallowed, her mouth still open, engulfing the chewed up food in the slick, rippling tube that was her gullet. He watched the lump travel down her throat disappearing behind her breasts as it traveled down to her tummy. "Jealous?" she teased. She pulled back, and covered her mouth as a dainty belch came out from between her lips. "Scuse me." She looked down at the plate, only to see Tim sprinting across the table towards her. "What!?"

Tim launched himself off of the table, towards Harley's lap; he landed there with a bounce, rolling once, then quickly got to his feet, crawling towards Harley's legs. Harley scooted back in her chair, trying to catch the Boy Wonder, but he had already started to climb/tumble down her legs, descending the titanic clown with shocking speed. He reached her foot, jumping off of it and ran under the dark table. "See ya later, Quinn!" he called out, though he knew the clown couldn't hear him.

"Get back here!" she yelled, crawling under the table after him; however Tim was too fast and flighty for her, and he easily evaded her attempts to catch him. He made a break for the door leading back into the rest of the warehouse; if he could make it there, then he could find a better hiding spot, and then it'd be a matter of waiting for the right time to leave, or of waiting to be rescued...

Tim was knocked off his feet as a boot slammed down next to him. "I leave you alone for half an hour, and you let your prisoner escape..." Giganta scolded, scooping Tim up in one massive hand. She held him up, waving him at Harley by his cape. "Maybe I should take him off your hands, since you obviously can't keep a handle on him. What do you say, cutie," she asked Tim, holding him in front of her smiling mouth, "want to take a ride with Giganta?"

"NO!" Harley squealed, jumping up and banging her head on the table, "OWCH! You can't, Biggie, I promised Ivy I'd keep an eye on him! It's not my fault he got away, the brat jumped me while I was eating!"

"Biggie?" asked Giganta, unimpressed. "And he jumped you at the amazing height of a few inches tall."

"I promise I'll keep a closer eye on him, so will you please please PLEASE give him back?" Harley got on her knees, begging the much taller woman. Giganta rolled her eyes, and dropped Tim into her hands, making Harley squeal with delight.

"Fine, fine, stop your whining. But if I catch him running loose again, he's lunch. You got that?"

"Yeah, don't worry, I won't let him out of my sight!"

"Good. I'm going back to the monitoring room." Giganta blew a kiss to Tim before she left. "Now, you keep all that in mind, little bird, the next time you try and escape." With that, she left, returning to her post.

Harley got back to her feet, frowning at the small boy trapped in her fist. "You're in big trouble, mister! You almost got me in trouble with that little stunt of yours. I think I'm going to have to punish you somehow, so you don't get any more bright ideas..." She put a hand on her chin and the other containing Tim on her hip, in thought. "Oh, I know!" she exclaimed. Once again, she set Tim on the counter, and once again she returned to the refrigerator, this time opening up the freezer. She got out a large tub of vanilla ice cream, as well as several containers of condiments; nuts, sprinkles, chocolate chips, caramel, chocolate syrup, a can of whipped cream... "I sure am glad Red and I stopped by the store on our way here!" Harley commented as she got to work constructing her second masterpiece. Tim watched as she scooped huge balls of ice cream into a bowl before covering them alternating lines of chocolate and caramel, followed by chocolate chips and nuts, topping the desert off with whip cream. "And now for the cherry," she said, looking directly at Tim.

Tim froze up. What had happened to not wanting him to be eaten? He backed away, but stopped when he reached the edge of the counter; with Harley looming closer, apparently with the mind to add him to her sundae, he wondered if splattering against the kitchen floor would be better or worse than being eaten alive. Before he could even think about taking the leap, Harley grabbed him roughly, depositing him on top of her ice cream. She squeezed more chocolate on top of him, covering him entirely with a sticky, sweet, semi-solid covering. He wiped the chocolate out of his eyes just in time for her to drop sprinkles on top of him. He glared up at her as she carried him once more to the table, a spoon in hand.

"What? I can afford the calories. You have any idea how much I burn doing acrobatics and fighting you Bat-guys wearing this suit? Besides, it's summer; who doesn't like a little ice cream on a hot summer's day in an abandoned warehouse?" Harley began to dig in, sending Tim tumbling down the hill of ice cream and condiments, where he landed with a splat. The ice was already starting to melt, making it hard for him to get a grip with his feet; the heavy chocolate covering him also restricted his movements, making it doubly hard to escape the bowl. Whenever he did reach the rim, Harley would just knock him back down. "Ah, ah, ah! This is your time out, bird brat!" She scooped a chuck of ice cream out next to him, and used the flat of her spoon to knock him into the hole. "Now you just stay there; momma's got a date with this here bowl of ice cream!" As Harley continued to eat, Tim sat in the puddle of melted ice cream at the bottom of the bowl, which came up to his waist. Eventually, Harley finished what was left of the solid ice cream; all that remained in the bowl was Tim, and the small pool of ice cream mixed with assorted condiments.

"Well, it'd be a shame to let it go to waste..." Harley said, bringing the bowl to her lips. Tim got to his feet, horrified, as she opened her mouth wide, tipping the bowl. He scrambled away, but with nothing to hold onto he slowly slid down the bowl with the last bit of Harley's ice cream, inevitably falling into her mouth. Harley began to roll him around her mouth, licking the chocolate off of his body and gradually replacing the condiments that covered him with her own sticky saliva. The atmosphere inside her mouth was stuffy and wet, like that of a sauna, and her movements were just as chaotic as her personality as she battered him around her mouth. She swallowed a few times to get rid of the accumulated food and saliva, which sent a jolt of terror up Tim's spine each time it happened. It didn't help that from her moans she clearly enjoyed his taste.
12231221.title: Snack Time

12232.title: Are you sure?

122322.content: Are we down sizing the Caped Crusader?
122322.title: Should Batman shrink?

choices: Batman has a wild ride just getting to Selina's place
Catwoman runs into some unwanted company on her way home
1223221.content:
Shrink Rays; some days it seems like ANYBODY can get their hands on them, either through theft or just making it themselves. Really, unless you want to use it to rob a bank or shrink an entire city to put into a bottle, why would anybody need a shrink ray? At any rate, it doesn’t matter since this latest acquisition of such a device was once again at the hands of a villain, this time one of Batman’s Rogue’s, Anarky, the prodigy gadget master who now has the power to crush any government he doesn’t like, namely all of them, under his feet. However, the Dark Knight isn’t going to let that happen.

From his high vantage point, the villain tossed down his smoke bombs, and Batman quickly shielded himself with his cape before they exploded. In the time it then took him to use his cape to fan the smoke away, Anarky had shot out his grappling hook out of his scepter and swung in to knock the Dark Knight down. Batman however flipped in the air, kicking Anarky right in the jaw while he got back on his feet. He through a batarang to knock that scepter out of his hand, but a quick switch on for the electrical stun baton let him deflect that. Anarky came swinging at the caped crusader, but Batman evaded his blows, and managing snatch out his own grapple device out of his belt. After jumping back, Batman fired it and grabbed Anarky himself, pulling him hard in his direction and jumping over the stumbling villain and slamming his hard in the shoulder, his scepter falling to the ground. With that kicked out of the way, Batman moved in further, but Anarky surprised him a flare gun.

“AAHH!!” Batman suddenly found himself blinded, kicking himself as he heard Anarky running. He quickly got his eyes back to normal, but that was when another bright flash suddenly shot at him.

Outside, leaping onto a nearby rooftop, was none other than Catwoman herself. The world’s greatest thief was sporting her latest costume and she had to admit, this little number had really grown on her. Next to diamonds, it seemed skintight leather was this girl’s best friend, and for as much as she had enjoyed her old looks, she had to admit that it was nice to actually have a stealthy look for once. Just being agile and having a few gadgets can only get you so far, just ask ol’ pointy ears.

The pretty kitty was on her way to tonight’s heist. Lately she had been trying to stay more on the Dark Knight’s good side, both out of respect and for reasons that were much more ‘fun’, but with what Selina had in mind for tonight, she just couldn’t resist and had to get her paws on it. Now however, she was suddenly seeing an intensely bright light coming from this Goth Corp research lab. Switching on her goggles, they showed her that there was definitely something interesting going on in there. “Curiosity, go easy on me.” She said, and swung her whip out to swing over.

Groaning, Batman wobbled on his feet, trying to get a grip on what had just happened. Other than feeling a little woozy, he seemed fine, but this time when his eyes cleared up, he found out just how wrong he was. Anarky had activated the shrink ray, and he was now only five inches tall!

“It works! HAHA! At last, I shall be known as the one who crushed the mighty Batman, right under his boot.” Anarky cackled, leaping over and kicking down to finally rid the world of this nuisance once and for all, Catwoman HIYAHED him right onto his back. As Batman fired a zip line to evade the two dueling giants, his female ‘friend’ didn’t waste any time in taking this nut job down. As he tried to get up, she snapped her whip right around his ankles and made him fall flat on his face. While he dealt with the sudden head injury, she leapt up and out of sight, and as he stumbled onto his feet, suddenly he felt her weight land on her shoulders and she wrapped her legs around his head. With him trapped between her thighs, Selina squeezed as tightly as she could, soon rendering that whacko unconscious, and she leapt off as he fell.

“That’s one way to shut a man up.” Striking a subtle, yet saucy pose, Selina only briefly admired her work before she turned to the whole reason she’d intervened in the first place. He was looking up at her, just a few yards away, and she strutted over to him. It was so strange seeing the big bad bat now as big as a mouse. Any intimidation or any other vibe he normally gave off to keep others at a safe distance was now completely gone, as no one would be scared of this small fry, no matter how much he would want them to be. In fact, by the time Catwoman got to him, a sinister grin was parting her delicious lips.

“Selina, I appreciate the help.” Batman simply stated, maintaining his stern façade even when reduced to this size though. Truth be told, it was all just an act. No one, not even Batman is immune to the shock that comes from being reduced to something so small, and as soon as he was back to normal, he was going to breathe a big sigh of relief. He just had to get to that Shrink Ray “I need you to operate that device’s controls. I should be able to help you, and-“

The Dark Knight suddenly found himself gripped firmly and rocketed into the air. Catwoman wasn’t in a hurry, but at his size, one move of her arm felt like he was on a roller coaster. Now at her face, he watched Selina slip her goggles up to let him see the gleam in her eyes “Thanks, but I think I’ll help myself.”

In the blink of an eye, the zipper went down on her costume all the way, and Batman then found himself practically tossed in as she rocketed her fist past her hip and released him, zipping back up at the same speed. A tingle moved up Catwoman’s spine and she grinned gleefully just by feeling him there. Batman was now right up against one of her butt cheeks, the shape of his body down to the pointy ears now visible against the tight leather that hugged her body so well.

Of all the hugely fun nights this naughty kitty had been through, it was something so small that she knew was going to give her wildest romp yet. He always did.

123.content: Is it Wonder Woman or Hungry woman or Giantess Woman or Shrunken Woman or Unibirthing woman?
123.title: Wonder Woman

1231.content: What type of vore is it?
1231.title: Vore

12311.content:
It was a slow day for justice. In fact it was a slow week without the need of justice. It was bound to happen sooner or later. While most heroes would welcome peace Diana wasn't one of them. She was a warrior. She was an amazon. She grew restless without the need of dealing out justice to someone to the league's greatest villain or some punk simply robbing the local convenience store.
Diana did enjoy time off of work but this was ridiculous. Of course the Justice League was always on duty even during down time.....not that the league did have much down time as it were.

Diana was wandering down a street in Gotham. People on the street mostly ignored her. Most of them didn't even make eye contact with her. Diana was walking and not flying because she thought she had seen a purse snatcher going down the street earlier.... but it was a case of mistaken identity.
Diana sighed.
"Hey, aren't you Wonder Woman?" asked a voice behind her. Diana turned around to see a man wearing a top hat. It took Diana a minute to recognize the man. The Mad Hatter! Before Diana could do anything the Mad Hatter was quick in placing something on the side of her head. It was one of his mind-controlling cards.
"You think you can control an amazon?!" Demanded Diana reaching up to remove the card.
"Ordinary no" sneered the Mad Hatter. "But I made some improvements to my cards. Don't remove that"
Diana stopped. She tried to struggle against it but it was no use.
"Get her lasso" said the Hatter to someone behind her. Diana felt her lasso being removed. Whoever took away her lasso handed it over to the Mad Hatter who wrapped it around his shoulder.
The Mad Hatter motioned Diana to follow him as he walked past her. When Diana turned around she saw a kid not much older than twelve with a mind-controlling card attached to his head. Both Diana and the boy followed the Mad Hatter down the street and into a warehouse.
In the warehouse the Mad Hatter led Diana and the boy to a small office.
"Wait here" said the Hatter. "I won't be long"
The Hatter exited the office.

The office consisted of one desk and three chairs with a large window overlooking an empty lot next door. Diana and the boy sat in the chairs and waited.
"Who....who are you?" asked Diana fighting the mind control.
The boy said nothing.
"Don't.....worry" said Diana.

A scant five minutes later the Hatter entered the room holding a flask of bubbling liquid.
"A special blend of my new tea" said the Hatter. "Who wants a sip?"
The Hatter paused to consider his options. A cruel smile came over his face as he forced the vile tasting concoction down Diana's throat. Diana wanted to spit the drink back in the Hatter's face but she couldn't.
From the moment the tea entered her stomach Diana felt a great hunger come over her. What was in that tea?
"My tea is usually about giving people hallucinations" said the Hatter. "But this new tea is much different. I thought long and hard on who to test my new tea on. Then you just wander into me. Hungry are you?"
Diana's stomach growled. Diana nodded.
"Then eat the boy" said the Hatter.
Diana looked over to the boy. The boy looked terrified but didn't move. Diana got up from the chair and moved towards the boy.
"No...." said Diana. "I will not do this"
"Do it" ordered the Mad Hatter.
12311.title: Mad Hatter's new tea

choices: Digesting the boy has an interesting effect on her body
As they leave the warehouse, they're confronted by/ meet with someone
123111.content:
The amazon was trying her best to fight off the Mad Hatter's orders. For years she had used her power to defend the innocent, but now she was nearly powerless against the Hatter's sick, twisted wishes. As she reached out for the stationary boy she yelled out in protest of her actions once more: "No, I will not do this!" But the Hatter would not have anyone defy his technology. He looked into the face of the conflicted super heroine and said with a twinge of anger "Sweetheart, you will do what ever I command of you. You are in no position to talk back to me!" Wonder Woman was loosing what little control she had in this situation. She looked into the face of the mortified, scrumptious looking boy and was beginning to care more about filling the pit of her stomach. "I suppose a taste wouldn't hurt." she said with the delectable tyke in her arms. "Yes, that's it! Indulge yourself princess! This whelp will be serving you better as a snack than he does in his current form. First remove the card from his head. I can use it again for my next guest." At this point Wonder Woman had lost control of her words and actions, her heartbeat practically pounding right out of her chest. With one hand holding the boy's head she did as told and removed the card.
In an instant the boy came to life with a deafening cry for mercy. "Let me go! Please!" the 4 foot treat said, his fate now resting in the palm of Wonder Woman's hand. The Hatter paid no mind to the desperate flailing of the terrified child, and focused all attention on the dazed amazon who had drool coming all the way down to her exposed cleavage. Her hunger had become so great that her belly growled like that of the Nemean Lion. "What's the matter princess. Feeling famished?" the Hatter asked with a visible twinge of anticipation. Wonder Woman was still loosing her mind as the hunger had become severe, driving her thoughts almost completely. She saw the helpless kid fighting for his life in vain, and a part of her still wanted to comfort him; to put an end to this madness. With his hands clasped together, the young appetizer yelled, "Please don't eat me Mrs. Wonder Woman. I can get you something better! I don't taste very good! Please I don't want to be eaten!" On the inside Wonder Woman winced, but with another bellow from the pit that was her belly, her eyes looked at the kid with great anticipation and her mouth formed a smile, and she said "Yes, I am extremely famished!" The Hatter replied, "Well what are you waiting for, Wonder Woman? Devour this useless ruffian."
With that, the smiling amazon took the horrified child in both hands and brought him to her head. Her mouth opened impossibly wide and plunged the thrashing slab of meat into her throat. The kid's screams were muffled by both the walls of her esophagus and the amount of saliva that had accumulated up to this moment. Diana was fully aware of her actions but was in no position to express her utter horror, nor was she physically capable of saving the boy who's head was now pushed up against her collar bone. All she could do was shout internally as her body made it's first, superhuman gulp. With all of the saliva, the boy's head was pushed past the warrior's collar bone. Now it was positioned behind her breasts, which had been pushed out and were really stretching the limits of her chest plate. The Mad Hatter was overjoyed, seeing his invention in action. The results were beyond what he had expected as this was only his fourth attempt at a man-eater concoction. "Yes! Don't relent! Keep going until he's trapped fully inside of you!"
The princess's body was in absolute bliss. Despite feeling horrified on the inside, on the outside she was smiling a full smile and savoring every square inch of this heavenly meal. Another swallow brought the entirety of his chest into her throat which was already expanded greatly in every direction. The mighty goddess took another powerful swallow, allowing the morsel to come into her stomach. The boy was still fighting for his life, but was alas no match for Wonder Woman's monstrous appetite. He was but a fine meal, and to Wonder Woman's engorged tummy, it was a fine meal more than fit for a goddess such as herself. She now only needed one hand to keep the twerp in place, and the other was patting the fleshy prison underneath her chest plate. With another gulp Wonder Woman had entrapped the majority of her sacrificial offering, and to the Mad Hatter's surprise, her armor had done a pretty good job of adapting to her colossal gut, albeit with a few visible strains in the metal. The innocent tween who filled her greedy belly was still giving everything he had, trying not to be a bowel movement for one of his childhood heroes. Unfortunately for him, the thrashing around had only enhanced the amazonian stamina she had, and his shirt was being dissolved before she was even done trapping his body inside her own.
The Wonder Woman inside was still in anguish at what she was doing, but the card on her ear allowed her to live in bliss as she downed what was the best free meal she had been given. Her brain would've thanked the Hatter if her mouth wasn't full of the boy's feet. Closing her eyes, Diana Prince tucked in the rest of the boy and with one giant, powerful gulp, he was completely inside her. She closed her eyes as she felt with her hand the morsel sliding down her throat, disappearing behind her ample chest and plummet down to her stomach, which now made her look as if she was 9 months pregnant with quadruplets. She didn't need to sit down as she was more than capable of supporting the extra weight. Her brain was relieved that her chest was back into position in contrast to her hefty gut, still encased by her impressively sturdy armor.
"I did it!" the Hatter exclaimed with his hands in the air and a smile that would make the Joker jealous. "I've concocted the ultimate weapon!" He took another tea cup with the same concoction in his hands. "Did you enjoy the lunch I prepared for you, my darling?" The towering woman looked at the dwarf and said with a grateful tone, "Very much so, master. I owe you a great amount of gratitude" The Hatter was so proud of the progress he had made today. He would have settled for any young lady to be the guinea pig of his cruel experiment, but he ended up with the Ambassador of Love and Peace herself. This couldn't have ended up better for him. "Here, Wonder Woman." he said handing her the cup. "I still don't understand the full effects or range of this liquid, but just to be safe, have another dosage." Wonder Woman brought the cup to her head with one hand, the other still massaging her giant middle. "Yes, master." And so she drank the concoction, adding to her lunch. The Hatter was laughing with wicked glee and said to herself, "As long as I keep this mind control card attached to this wench at all times, my mission is as good as accomplished."
Wonder Woman was still able to observe everything that was happening outside, despite not having control of her brain. She could already feel that there was no hope of saving the innocent child inside her, as his body and mind had already fallen victim to her own body. She felt deeply ashamed and mourned for him as her powerful stomach showed the unconscious boy no mercy. She needed to find a way to regain control and put a stop to the Hatter's horrific deeds. And if she couldn't do that, well a goddess could always use more human sacrifices!
123111.title: It will all be over soon

choices: Robin steels his courage and attempts to free Diana of mind control
1231111.content:
Diana was one of the most beautiful women in the world. So much so that she was hailed as a goddess by some. As the unfortunate boy in her stomach was turning into goo a metamorphosis seemed to be happening to her body without the Mad Hatter's notice because he was too busy giggling madly at his triumph. Diana seemed to grow even more beautiful and even her curves became a lot more curvier. She even grew in height to tower over all who walked on the streets. People on the street were turning their heads towards Diana with a look of genuine reverence in their eyes.
Eventually a man of about thirty came right up to Diana and totally ignored the Mad Hatter.
"Eat me goddess!" pleaded the man. "I freely give my body and soul to you!"
This causes the Mad Hatter to finally notice that the woman he had just enslaved just grew three more feet making her near ten feet tall. Without any hesitation Diana grabs the man kneeling before her and quickly swallows him down
Inwardly Diana was utterly horrified that she ate another innocent bystander despite he was willingly feeding himself to her.
The second man she ate seemed to have an effect on her muscles this time. Even though she was one of the strongest members of the Justice League she wasn't very muscly. However this all changed. Soon she really did have the body of a goddess as her biceps, thighs and abs more than quadrupled in size!
"Why is eating people having that effect on you?" asked Mad Hatter aloud.
"I have no idea" said Diana.
There was also another change happening: Diana was starting to resist the mind control the Mad Hatter had over her.
"It hardly matters I suppose" said the Mad Hatter.


------

On a rooftop high above Robin looked down to see what was happening to Diana. He was horrified when he witnessed Diana eating a man that appeared to be a willing sacrifice to the Amazon goddess.
"Oh man" said Robin. "What should I do? I'm afraid she'll eat me if I go down there"
Robin was all alone. Both Bruce and Barbara were busy on the other side of Gotham fighting crime.

125332212111.content:
When you are bred for the sole purpose of becoming an assassin, to the point where you can’t even have a bottle unless you break your dad’s thumb and he refuses to speak to with words and thus make movement become the only language you understand, it’s a very likely possibility that life is not exactly going to be all that great. However, we all choose our own destinies and Cassandra Cain did just that after she made her first kill.

Up until that point, she had followed her father, David Cain, and did whatever he told her to do, even when he outright refused the few times she wanted him to read to her. She was so young and so innocent, but despite what she perceived to be right thanks to him, what she felt on that day when she was eight years old opened her eyes. Feeling someone fading away by her own hands, it was too horrendous for her, and she fled.

Free, but now alone, Cassandra found herself in Gotham City and from there, she found herself in the same position as Barbara Gordon once had been in years ago. The very sight of Batman and what he did made her absolutely certain of whom she wanted to be.

It took Gotham getting reduced to a No Man’s Land for the Dark Knight to actually meet her, but after which, Batman knew what he had to do. From there on, Cassandra got her mind rewired by a telepath so she could speak, and then wound up getting trained by Lady Shiva of all people so she could get her fighting style back. She’s now one of the best fighters around, and to be Batman’s sidekick, she has to be.

“Good Cassandra.” Batman managed to speak between several dodges as he was kept on his toes. Facing off against someone who knows your next five moves just by watching you take one step isn’t exactly easy, but then again, it wasn’t supposed to be.

On the other side, Batgirl was getting a little tired of this constant dodging. Usually her opponents would think they’d found a shot and go for it only for her to then grab their arm and snap it at the joint. Ever the calculating one however, her mentor was purposely keeping himself on the defensive long enough, until finally he gave her an opening when it seemed he was going to throw a punch. As soon as Cassandra went for it though, he ducked down and swept at her feet, but as she fell, she grabbed him and flung him down and as soon as his back collided with the ground, he felt her arm blades up against his throat.

“Excellent.” Batman smiled at her. Even with the full face mask, he could tell that his apprentice was doing the same. Once she let him, he headed to a bottle he’d placed nearby and began pouring a glass which was then handed to her. Training was sweaty work and like Bruce had said, she’d been really showing her stuff.

“You’re performance continues to be commendable Cassandra, I hope you know that. Still, I’m curious, do you ever find it…difficult to not ‘finish’ the job.” Good thing Cassandra had finished her drink, otherwise she couldn’t have asked “What?” Batman hated himself for having just said that but he couldn’t ignore what could happen “I’m not accusing you, I just want to make sure you are alright. The conditioning Cain put you through cannot be overcome easily and although I’m confident you would never intentionally kill anyone-”

“Please,” she stopped him right there. The girl who now had a voice wanted to use it “you don’t need to…worry about me. I can never forget what I felt, and I never want to go…through that again.” She might still be working on how to express and think in words, but she knew what she wanted; to be what Batman is and to never again become the same monster that had taken a life.

“I’m glad to hear.” Batman responded. Cassandra wasn’t the only one who could read people like a book and Batman knew that her words were entirely genuine. Plus, just in case there were any unexpected surprises that dear old dad left behind for her, hopefully this new technique would give Cassandra more of a fighting chance.

“Now, I’m going to have you learn a new technique. It’s rather unusual, but very powerful, and in the right hands, nonlethal. Lately, a lot female heroes have been utilizing it. Wonder Woman was the one who first displayed it.” Cassandra’s eyes suddenly lit up through her mask once she heard that. Her mentor was real Casanova both in and out of the costume, and amongst who knows how many women, lately she had been seeing him with the Amazon Princess more often than usual. It got her curious and it even reminded her of her first kiss, with Superboy, but all pondering and reflecting was put on hold while Batman continued to speak “It’s taught on her Island since only women can learn it, and is used as both an intimidation method as well as a way of containing criminals. It’s a man eating technique.”

“……Man Eating?” Cassandra may have a hard time grasping words, but she wasn’t alone in thinking that what the Dark Knight just uttered sounded like complete nonsense. They lived in a world where people could stretch like rubber, scream metal bending sound waves, or fly, but no one in the Bat Family had powers like that, which brings up the obvious question “How could I eat someone?”

“Simple,” Batman had his back to her, and as he turned, his costume looking particularly ominous all of a sudden even though nothing had changed, he was honestly trying not to enjoy this as he answered question “All you had to do was drink that glass of magic juice.”
125332212111.title: Batgirl takes a bite out of crime

Tim offers to let Cassandra eat him; she agrees
1253322121111.content:
Cassandra felt conflicted at this; on the one hand, she trusted and respected Batman, knew that he would never try and cause her or anyone else harm... and yet now he had tricked her into drinking a glass of "magic juice" that would apparently allow her to swallow people whole. "W-what?" she questions, confused and feeling betrayed. She felt a tingling sensation spreading through her body, coming from her stomach, and she felt like she was going to be sick.

"It's alright, Cassandra," he assures her, going to her side immediately, "the process is totally harmless. Just sit down; it'll be over soon." Batman lifts his mask, revealing the face of Bruce Wayne, and he smiles reassuringly. Sensing that he isn't lying, Cassandra walks over to a table with his help, taking a seat in one of the chairs. She could feel her innards shifting inside her; her stomach expanding, while the rest of her organs shrunk and shifted around. Her ribcage and the other bones in her torso and lower back felt almost rubbery, but the rest of her bones seemed to be hardening, growing stronger. Her muscles were tightening as well, becoming stronger and denser while remaining the same size. She wasn't in pain, but the sensation of her body changing and mutating combined with her expert body control felt very strange, to say the least. Sweat began to trickle down her face as her body heated up, her mind going blank as the mutagen finished its work.

When she finally awoke again, hours later, she was in her bed in Wayne Manor. She was still in her suit, though her mask was off, placed on her bedside table. Strangely, she felt fine- great, even!- but that also confused her. Had she just had a nightmare? Maybe she had been exposed to Scarecrow's fear toxin, leading to that strange dream. Cautiously, she put her mask back on and crept silently into the hallway, creeping down the stairs until she got to the kitchen. Along the way, her stomach rumbled curiously, loud growls emanating from her midsection embarrassingly often- she was trying to be stealthy, but you'd have to be deaf to miss the sound of her roaring tummy. It was morning, judging by the light streaming through the windows as she went, but she still kept to the shadows. If she had been exposed to the Scarecrow's chemicals, then the other members of her new family might be in danger, and she had to take things slow and tactically to assess the possible danger. She quietly crept through the kitchen, stopping when she smelled... bacon?

She walked quickly through the kitchen, finally reaching the dining room, where some of the other members of the Bat Family were eating breakfast. Tim Drake, Bruce Wayne, and Alfred Pennyworth looked at her as she entered. Dick Grayson and Barbara Gordon- Nightwing and Oracle- were absent. Cassandra noticed something odd, though; the table was absolutely packed with food. Huge piles of bacon and fried eggs, sausages, mountains of French toast, pancakes, and waffles stacked high with toppings, tons of hash browns and multiple pitchers of milk and juice. The sight and smell of it all made Cassandra's stomach growl even louder with hunger, making her blush when Tim stared directly at her midsection, and she felt saliva begin to pool in her mouth as she stared at the feast. But...

The sight confused her; you could feed an army with this much food, let alone four people. "What is...?" she asks, motioning to the banquet.

"Good morning, Miss Cassandra," Alfred greets, motioning to a chair nearby. Cassandra slowly takes her seat, pulling off her mask and politely placing it on her lap. "Master Wayne asked me to cook this meal for you- no small feat I might add, I made a morning of it- because he said you would be ravenously hungry when you woke up."

Cassandra's eyes widened in shock, and she quickly glanced at Bruce, who was casually sipping on a cup of coffee while reading the newspaper. "That... wasn't a dream?" she asks. Looking up briefly, Bruce smiles, shaking his head.

"No, it wasn't. The juice I gave you yesterday has turned you into a Metahuman- like the Flash- giving you powers. You now have mild superhuman strength and speed, greatly increased flexibility, and a much faster, more efficient digestive system. However, your superhuman physiology now requires you to consume more calories than you used to- roughly thirty times as much, about 90,000 to 100,000 calories a day." Cassandra stared at him, and his smile wavered a bit. "It's totally harmless, Cassandra- I'm confidant in your abilities, that's why I gave you that juice. You've even managed to hold back your hunger a surprisingly long time; when Black Canary was given the juice, she ate Green Arrow almost immediately after waking up. Not that he minded. Now, you should probably start eating- in fact, lets turn it into an exercise. Lets see how well you can control your digestive tract, as well as how well you can hold your meals; eat as much food as you can, without digesting it."

Cassandra, still greatly confused at the situation she found herself in but also wanting to obey the man that took her in, grabbed a plate and piled it with what she would normally eat during breakfast; two eggs, a few slices of bacon, a few sausages, and two pancakes. She cautiously started eating- and her eyes widened at just how good everything tasted. Quickly clearing her plate, she went back for seconds as her rumbling tummy growled happily at being fed. Then she went for thirds. And fourths.

Tim's eyes widened as Casssandra consumed plateful after plateful of breakfast food, hungrily devouring everything as she shoved it into her slavering maw, barely chewing as she started gulping down bite after bite of food. The massive bulges in her throat when she swallowed, the wet sounds of her smacking lips as she engulfed her food, the way she let out little moans when she tasted something new... Tim began to get hard under the table, sweating and hoping that Cassandra was too busy pigging out to notice the signs of his arousal. He gaped as her stomach slowly started to expand, stretching out her already tight costume; going from a small potbelly, to a big one, to looking like she was pregnant with twins, and she was still getting bigger. Eventually, she started to slow down, finishing her meal by tipping a pitcher of milk directly into her mouth and gulping it down rapidly, filling her stomach to the brink.

"Good heavens!" Alfred muttered, looking both at the table and at Cassandra's corpulent midsection, which pressed against the table, "I think that's the most anyone's ever enjoyed my cooking!"

"...thank you for the food, Alfred," Cassandra says softly, cradling her huge gut. Like Bruce had requested, she was concentrating on suppressing her digestive functions; her stomach wasn't producing acids, the walls of her stomach churned weakly against her huge meal, and while a little food had been sent into her intestines just from being squished to the bottom against the sphincter that led further into her body, it flowed extremely slowly through her gut.

"Excellent, Cassandra!" Bruce congratulated her, standing up. Cassandra moved to match his motion, finding that she could easily stand despite the massive weight in her stomach; however her belly, no longer constrained by the table, shot out, making her gasp and turn red in embarrassment as her costume tore open, revealing the pale dome of her gurgling tummy. Tim went redder as well, his mouth open in shock as he looked at her belly, then quickly looking away out of embarrassment. Bruce smirked at this. "Alright, Cassandra, you've earned it- go ahead and start digesting."

Cassandra said nothing, merely letting out a sigh as she stopped concentrating on her belly. It gurgled long and loudly, causing her to blush some more as it quickly and ruthlessly went to work, digesting the contents of her stomach. In just a few minutes, most of it was in her intestines; in a few more, her stomach was just as flat as it had been, the only signs that she had eaten such a massive amount of food being a few crumbs around her mouth and the massive hole that her belly had torn in her costume, revealing her scarred, but muscular abs.

"Incredible," Tim muttered, both at the speedy digestion and the look of Cassandra's fit body. They both looked at each other, blushing furiously, then just as quickly looked away.

"Oh, dear," Alfred said, "I'll get the needle and thread."

"That won't be necessary, Alfred," Bruce said, "I've already taken the liberty of designing a new suit for Cassandra. In fact," he says, turning once more to Cassandra, "you should meet me down there right away, so you can try it on. And so we can continue to test your new abilities by having you eat me."

"WHAT!?" the others said, all at once.

"I know what you're thinking," he said, motioning to Cassandra, "you think she'll digest me, like that food just now. But I know I'll be fine."

"Master Wayne, I must say that I don't think this is an advisable course of action!" Alfred pleaded.

"I do not think this is a good idea either!" Cassandra added, looking at the man who she looked up to like a father.

"Yeah, ditto!" Tim said.

"Thank you all for your concerns," Bruce says, looking each of them in the eyes, "but I'm confidant that this is the correct course of action. Unless there are any other complaints, we should head down immediately Cassandra. We still need to go on patrol later tonight."

A few minutes later, they were in the Bat Cave. Bruce suited up in his own costume, while he had Cassandra change into her new one. It looked identical to her old one, but as Bruce explained the costume was actually very different. “We’re talking about this later Pilgrim,” Ramona said, her expression softening slightly as she looked at Scott’s nervous face. She wasn’t really angry, in fact it might be a good thing, nothing like seeing your ex get hard to lift a girl’s spirits. Knives could no longer think she’s unattractive after Scott latterly poked her with the truth. Still, she couldn’t let him think he could get away with hugging girls while naked. She had to make sure he knew who he belonged to.

“There isn’t going to be a later, you cunt.” Everyone turned to Envy, they had almost forgotten about her. Weak from the effects of her Power Up Addiction, Envy shakily walked towards them, her hands fumbling around in her pockets. Several Power Ups fell from her fingers, including one for weight gain that Ramona instantly noticed. Finding the one she wanted, she popped it into her mouth and swallowed. Moments later her mouth started to widen, growing bigger and bigger until her open mouth was bigger then her head.

“If I can’t have Scott as my slave, I’ll have him as my body fat!” Her gaping maw started to pull in air, sucking discarded clothes and junk off the floor and into the vortex that was her mouth. Grabbing Scott’s hand, Ramona held on to the doorframe, as Envy’s suction grew stronger. Everything that wasn’t nailed down was pulled into her mouth or dragged towards Envy’s mouth. They could see her belly growing as she took in more, the sound of gurgling coming from her expanding gut.

“I can’t hold on!” Scott screamed as he found his grip slipping. All the sex had left him very sweaty, making it impossible for him to hold on for very long. He looked one last time into Ramona eyes, whispering he loved her before his hand slipped and he went flying towards Envy’s mouth.

“Scott!” Ramona screamed as her boyfriend headed towards certain digestion.

1353322222121121221221211112222.content:
When Scott met Ramona, Knives felt like she had been living her life on the sidelines. Even when she didn’t want to admit it to herself, the most exciting stuff, mainly the stuff involving her ex-boyfriend, seemed to not involve her at all, even before they officially broke up. Knives had hated Scott for that, but it didn’t last. She grew to pity him, then was eventually able to let her past feelings go and move on with her life. Now though, once again, trouble had found Scott Pilgrim and Ramona Flowers, and the former was about to experience trouble for the last time. That is, if Knives hadn’t been watching in shock from the sidelines. When a crazy rock star tries to murder your boyfriend by gaining the powers of a certain Nintendo character, being frozen with shock and dread is a perfectly normal response. However, the moment Scott lost his grip on Ramona, Knives found herself running towards the danger.

There were no thoughts in her head, no doubts, and no concerns for herself at all. All she felt was the desire to save him, even though she knew what it meant. It was her only chance to save the boy that had once stolen her heart. Even when it seemed like her extra weight would cost her precious seconds, her bowels made up for that. As Knives leapt her heavy bulk into the air, her ass blared out another fart, more powerful than the last, and the stinky outburst propelled her right to Scott. The sound and the smell were deafening, even in the vortex that lead to Envy’s mouth, and both caused him to open his eyes. He didn’t want the last thing he saw to be the inside of Envy’s maw. Amazingly, sucking in the fumes did nothing to halt the crazy bitch this time. Instead, the sight that greeted him was Knives flying at him courtesy of ninja determination and rocket powered flatulence. To say Scott was shocked would be an understatement.

It all happened so fast, and yet to them, it all seemed so clear. Even Ramona felt things slow down as she saw the chunky chinse girl embrace her boyfriend. Knives’ touch was brief, it had to be, but even so, she found herself glad that she got to hug Scott one more time. Once again, his heart still belonged to another, and she found old emotions rushing back to her. However, in that moment, all the heartache, it didn’t bother her. The next thing she knew, she was flinging Scott to freedom, sending him right out of the path of danger. Then, everything went dark, and Knives knew no more.

*GULP!!!!!*

Envy’s cheeks were bigger than her entire head, but only for a second, as she gulped her biggest mouthful down as soon as it touched her tongue. Her belly was already well engorged from many of the items in Scott’s now much more bare room, but once she swallowed Knives, everything inside of her was absorbed. Suddenly, her entire body blew up with mounds of blubber in an instant. After Scott impacted the ground, both he and Ramona beheld this sight. Just like the character that inspired that Power Up, Envy did indeed get an ability from the girl she ate. Unfortunately for her, all it did was make her really heavy. Had Envy wanted strength on top of that, she should have taken a pixilated turkey.

With as much shock as there was expansion, Envy groaned sharply and extensively, her voice growing deeper with each passing second, as her body bloated up with mounds upon mounds of blubber. The former rocker felt like she was a water balloon, but what was filling her up was far thicker and heavier, much to her dismay. Her crazy mind could have accepted the bloating she would get from Scott, but digesting Knives made her belly stay just as fat as it was before. Now though, it was much softer, with rolls the size of tires that reached all the way to the ground. Her formerly slender legs were now as wide as they were long, looking more like long stocks of cottage cheese. Her arms were virtually the same, to the point where Envy didn’t even know if she could bend her elbows anymore. Not that she was in any condition to wonder about much anyway. So much weight gain at once left her already unstable mind to flee further away from sanity, and left her only able to respond one way.

BUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Flying up through the rolls that now replaced her neck, and out from between chipmunk-like cheeks, was the last gassy outburst Knives would ever be responsible for. Like hers, this one was just as strong as it was loud, creating tremors that knocked Ramona onto her big booty. Ironically, apart from making her massively round form jiggle, the belch had the same effect on Envy. Once her ass hit the floor though, it cracked while the entire building shook. Truly, with ass cheeks nearing the size of yoga balls, Envy’s butt was powerfully heavy. Once she was out of her daze, it was going to be a massive pain for her to try and stand up. Fortunately, the bitch with knockers the size of pumpkins wasn’t going to get that chance.

Ramona didn’t think as she made her move; the only impulse in her brain was to seize the opportunity before her. Only after she lunged at it did the raging inferno fill up her entire being. Envy was going to pay, with everything she had. Instead of attacking the big butter ball directly, Ramona made her move to the killer’s purse laying nearby, and once she got her hands on it, low and behold, Power Ups greeted her in abundance. Envy’s addiction showed no bounds, and Ramona lashed her hand out at the best one she could see, as tears began to fill her eyes. It was time to end Envy’s madness once and for all. After tonight, she would never again hurt her boyfriend or anyone else ever again.

Both Ramona and the Power Up would see to it, and it was…

It was Monday, of course.

Garfield awoke from a deep sleep with a bad feeling in his chest, just like every other Monday. “Ugh, not again” said Garfield with a frown, struggling to get out of bed. But today did have one silver lining as Jon was away, leaving only Garfield and Odie in the house, so the fat cat could do whatever he wanted just for today.

“Wow, think of all the lasagne I could eat” thought Garfield “or how much torture I could put Odie through”.

Eventually Garfield decided to stay at home; at least he had food and entertainment here, and slowly made his way down the stairs.

Going into the kitchen, Garfield saw that Jon had left the lasagne cupboard unlocked, “hehe” Garfield laughed “guess I know what I’m doing today.”

But out of the corner of his eye, the cat saw Odie walking slowly towards him with a strange smile on his face.

“Odie? What are you so happy about?” said Garfield as he turned around, becoming slightly unnerved by the dog’s sinister smile as he walked towards him.

The dog didn’t respond, he couldn’t, but in his mind he was thinking about all the times Garfield had kicked and abused him. All that pain had built up over the years, but now it was the dog’s turn for some fun…

The two rolled around as the cat tried to throw Odie off, begging and screaming the whole time, but the dog was too strong for him. A big tongue came out and licked Garfield but instead of filling the cat with annoyance this time it filled him with disgust and fear, “No, please Odie” he tried to plead as the dog smacked his lips “I’ll be better next time, I promise!”

But it was too late, all the years of being hurt and abused had worn Odie down and now all he could think about was swallowing the cat whole and feeling him slowly waste away inside him. With a final lick and growl, Odie opened his jaws and prepared to turn his fat friend into a delicious snack.

Garfield looked in horror as the dog’s jaws parted, giving Garfield and a great view of his pulsating throat, and went over his head. The cat kicked and struggled as the dog’s saliva dripped all over his head, his ears were filled with the sounds of swallowing and sucking as the dog tasted his plump body.

Garfield suddenly regretted all his years of overeating, if he wasn’t so fat maybe Odie wouldn’t have thought about eating him. The dog certainly seemed to like his taste judging from the disgusting moans and “mmmm” sounds coming from all around him, which just served to sicken Garfield even more.

“No, this can’t be it!” said the cat as he fought even harder, being pulled further and further towards the stomach with every swallow the dog made. Garfield tried kicking his legs against Odie’s throat, in response the dog started biting down on Garfield’s thick stomach, sending hot pain through the cat’s body. “n-no, stop” Garfield whispered, which the dog seemed to hear as he did stop, but with another swallow the cat’s feet were pulled into the dog’s moist maw and with a final GULP Garfield was gone forever, food for a voracious canine.

He slid down the muscular oesophagus with a struggle, the cat was almost too fat for Odie to swallow whole but with a few more swallows and coughs the dog succeeded in bolting down the biggest meal he had ever eaten. The fat feline was deposited into the fleshy stomach, all ready to be melted down and digested like all the other pieces of meat the dog had eaten before him.

“Please Odie” Garfield begged again, trying to crawl back up the throat “Jon will be back soon.” But deep down the cat knew this wasn’t true, and the dog knew it as well, their owner had left for the week and wouldn’t be back until next Monday. By which time Garfield would be completely broken down by the dog’s digestive system and deposited in the back garden in a whole new form.

Odie picked his teeth with a sharp claw as he listened to the pleas inside his fat belly, lightly rubbing his bulging organ he could feel the cat struggling and wriggling underneath his skin as the digestive acids worked hard to melt him down. This whole situation had made him feel more pleasure than ever before, and he desperately wanted more…
