As the women heard the desperate cry, they all wondered if the scream was meant in horror over being swallowed or horror in being denied a final release before the ultimate final release.

“Aunty, there’s no need to shout. I was only adding a little extra flavor to my meal. No harm, no foul,” Sheila explained as she looked across at her disgruntled aunt. Sheila had always been playful, even in her preteens she had forced her food to pleasure her on threat of being skewered and cooked. Her youth had been spent humiliating and tormenting hundreds of different animals for the mere joy of it. Some would call Sheila a sadist, but she always considered her cruel ways to be the inborn to her breed. Wolfs were after all one of the top predators in the world, way better then those lazy cats, so why shouldn’t they parade their superiority?

Since growing up and seeing the world, Sheila had lost a little bit of her superior attitude, but she hadn’t been humbled enough by the big, wild world to lose it completely. She still liked to mess around, casual sex, partying all night and the occasional genocide of a few yummy animals. She had a little bit of the wilderness inside her and was not ashamed to display it openly.

“Dear, you don’t ‘play’ with your food, especially at the dinner table. Prey is meant to be eaten, not sexually assaulted.” Eleanor managed to sound firm, even if she knew inside that she was being a hypocrite. She had been messing around lately with not one, but two yummy bunnies. She hadn’t eaten them, but she had certainly committed played around with both in the earnest. Trying to lecture about morals when she was in secret acting in a very immoral way made her stomach turn. Then again, that feeling in her gut could just be the death throes of poor jay as he’s being digested.

Sheila rolled her eyes, not taking the older wolves words seriously. She just didn’t understand the needs of the working woman. “I’m sure in your day prey was only eaten and women all spent their days in the kitchen preparing said prey. But us working girls are to busy to date and have steady relationships, so we use expendable partners, ones that you don’t cuddle with, you digest. I’m not the only woman that does it, right Aby?”

“Um, well, yah,” Aby mumbled as she blushed heavily under her grey fur. The discussion about her own sexual needs had been brought up several times with Kell, but Aby had never explained her unique tastes for tiny mice to Kell’s much more proper mother. Aby expected the older woman to give her the stink eye, but instead the old wolf looked like she was indecisive about being either embarrassed or irritated by the line of questioning.

Seeing that the discussion was going down hill, Kell spoke out in support for her mother’s moral stance. “I’m a working woman too, but I don’t mess around with my food in any inappropriate way. What do you have to say to that?”

“Of coarse you don’t mess around with your food,” Sheila grinned smugly, “you marry it. I’m sure that being married to a big, stud of a rabbit has to have many advantages. There’s one advantage in particular that I’m most interested in. Tell me my beloved cousin, how is your sex life?”

Kell went pale. She had walked right into that one.

“Yah Kell, dish. Tell us single girls a little about what does on upstairs,” Aby slyly added. Kell and Aby spent a lot of time together and they touched on some really risqué subjects like canine racism and inter-species marriage, even Aby’s own sex life wasn’t off topic. The only thing Kell was guarded about was her love life with Kevin. She would drop subtle hints about how nice her night with Kevin was, but never go into detail. The lack of info had peaked Aby’s curiosity and she was desperate to know something juicy. She had already admitted to Kell that she likes having mice up her hindquarters, sharing went both ways.

Seeing her best friend turn on her, Kell looked to her mother for support, but she stayed out of it. Looking away, Eleanor tried to keep her nose out of the conversation, but she was just as curious as Aby was about her own daughter’s sex life. Kell had confined in her during her first marriage that her husband was horrible in the sack and when she married Kevin, Eleanor thought she would be told how things were in the bedroom too. But Kell had never brought it up, avoiding the subject of sex completely. Eleanor didn’t like to pry, but she wanted to know how her cub was doing.

All the women leaned in, eager to hear the hot gossip about Kell’s husband. The only sound in the kitchen was the gurgling coming from inside their bellies as the four boys they’d eaten were digested and processed by their bodies. Kell sighed, knowing that she had to give the vultures something to get them off her back. This was going to be so uncomfortable.
141111221212212221.title: Everyone has to get Eaten

1411112212122122211.content:
“There’s not much say, really.” Kell squirmed under their unwavering stares, “We’re just your average couple. Most nights we just cuddle and talk… after two or three hours of the bump and grind.” Kell mumbled under her breath.

“Could you repeat that last part?” Aby asked, “Some of us don’t have canine hearing.”

“Yes, speak up dear. My ears aren’t quite what they used to be.” Elanor added.

Kell gritted her fangs, “Mother, I know you heard me just fine… My Kevin, he… Oh, I might as well just spit it out! Kevin has the sex drive of… well, of a rabbit. But he’s so much larger and muscular than your average, run of the mill, bunny!” Kell paused briefly. She closed her eyes and smiled, as if basking in some euphoric memory, “He has the force and dexterity of a jackhammer.” She purred, reminiscing. Elanor had to set her wobbly cup of joe down. Her eyes were as big as saucers. Sheila allowed herself a skeptical chuckle.

“It’s true!” Kell insisted, snapping out of her reverie, “He’s hung like a stallion! And every night, the moment our bedroom door closes, I pounce on him like a cat on a king sized canary… no offense, Aby.”

“None taken.”

“We’ll have a few rounds on the floor. Then maybe a little hanky-panky in the bathroom while we get ready for bed… and then it’s a nonstop marathon until I all but pass out! I have to tell you girls, being Kevin’s lover is more exhausting than being a full time hunter at Herdthinners. But it’s a gooooood kind of exhaustion.”

“I don’t think I’m ever going to be able to look at Kevin the same way again.” Abby chuckled lightly while tenderly massaging her boy filled gut, “Because of his size and species I’ve always had my suspicions, but now that you’ve come out and said it… How are you even able to walk in the morning? I’d imagine you’d be so sore you’d have to hunt from a wheelchair.” Aby and Sheila both chortled.

“Don’t misunderstand.” Kell replied, in a serious tone, “He may be big… in more ways than one, and he can be quite vigorous when we make love, but he can also be very gentle when he wants to be. After a few harsh rounds, we often gently fuck the hours of the night away.” Kell couldn’t help but get aroused talking about her sex life. The women’s sensitive noses were able to detect the musky scent wafting up from in-between Kell’s closed thighs, but they were all courteous enough to ignore it.

“The longest I’ve ever had the horizontal mambo going for was half an hour.” Sheila couldn’t help but be impressed.

“That might be because most of your ‘lovers’ are just prey you decide to rape before eating.” Elanor replied, in a dismissive tone.

“True enough, but still…”

“So… satisfied?”

“Truth be told, I was hoping to hear a bit more about the specifics” Sheila confessed, “How did last night play out? Don’t skimp out on the details.”

Kell nibbled hesitantly on her bottom lip. She had to consider how much more of her sex life she was willing to divulge. After a few seconds hesitation, she decided she’d tell them a little about last night’s exploits… Of course, they’d be getting a censored version. There’d be no mention of their role-playing, or of the ménage à trios her, Kevin, and a short lived gopher woman had engaged in. As Kell began speaking, the women quieted down, all the while gently caressing their bulging middles.

Aby could feel a dull twitching within her stomach. The young rabbit trapped inside must have gone into shock. Lightly stroking her bloated abdomen, Aby considered whether or not she should show mercy to the young one. Aby was a kinder predator than most and she wouldn’t let her diet violate her code of ethics. For example, she wouldn’t eat at most fast-food restaurants because they insisted on dropping children into the deep fryer while they were still alive. Now normally, after gobbling up some unfortunate young boy or girl, she’d suck in her displace tummy fat, crunching her belly. By doing so her stomach’s occupant would be compressed into an unbearably tight ball. The pressure would often shatter their spine, killing them instantaneously. Ably obviously didn’t poll her bowel movements, but she assumed a sudden, quick death was preferable to a long drawn out one that involved fur and flesh oozing off a victim’s bones while they were still conscious. Of course, she wouldn’t do this for just anyone. The victim had to be young and pitiful.

As she continued listening to Kell, Aby decided not to intervene. She enjoyed the rhythmic twitching of her prey; having a poor boy convulsing against her stomach walls produced a delightfully ticklish sensation. She didn’t treat herself often so, while it made her feel a little bit guilty, she allowed her stomach to continue diligently doing its work, unmolested.

While Aby, Kell, and Sheila basked in the death throes of their food, Elanor wasn’t having quite as enjoyable a meal. The young mousling she’d eaten was proving to be quite a fighter. The old wolf just couldn’t handle meals as well as she once could. Her stomach acids were weaker, thanks to her aging pancreas, and her entire digestive tract had become far less efficient. It took meals much longer to process and they could survive for hours, sometimes even an entire day. Once, the day after taking an exceptionally potent antacid to settle her heartburn, she shat out a semi-digested, yet still living, shrew. Elanor had felt a great deal of sympathy for the woman, but the shrew had reeked so horribly, Elanor opted to flush the toilet rather than fish her out. With a frightened ‘eep’ the barely conscious shrew woman had been sucked down the tubes.

Elanor knew she had to find more docile meals, preferably younger ones. Her stomach just couldn’t handle large, powerful prey anymore. Not only did digesting them take forever these days, their struggles were just as likely to sting her stomach lining as they were to massage it. Though her current meal’s struggles were for the most part soothing, the odd, sharp poke or blow would cause her a few seconds of discomfort. ‘I should have comforted him a bit,’ Elanor thought to herself, sullenly, ‘he’s probably going to give me terrible gas.’ Her mental musings were cut short when Kell let slip an exceptionally lewd and juicy detail about what Kevin liked to do to her from behind.

“I wish I could get involved in a passionate relationship.” Sheila sighed, once Kell had finished.

Aby nodded in agreement, “I’d like that too but there just aren’t enough hours in a day.”

“Yeah…” Sheila kneaded her tummy flesh, “We working gals just don’t have the time for a long term, reciprocal relationship.” As she continued to ply her gut a thoughtful look began to develop on her face, “I wonder if I could capture myself a more… permanent lover. He’d have to be young. He’d be easier to break and he’d last longer.”

Elanor snorted, “You can’t CAPTURE yourself a husband, that’s not how it works!”

“I didn’t say anything about a husband.” Sheila replied in a curt, stuck up voice.

The women gossiped for a while longer. Eventually, Aby decided it was getting late in the afternoon. Collecting Danny (Who’d been playing with Ace, a bug Lindesfarne was keeping imprisoned in her room) the two said their goodbyes. All of the women gave Danny a hug and promised they’d keep an eye out for him when hunting. Picking up Danny and setting him on her shoulders, Aby took him home.

…………………………………………………………………….


With a soft grunt, the foul smelling turd began to emerge from her anus. Fiona gave a sigh of relief as she felt the heavy mass evacuate her bowels and impact with the grass; she’d needed to do this ever since the start of practice. She wasn’t finished yet though. Gritting her fangs, Fiona continued to concentrate. A few more brown logs were released, and they plopped down on top of the original. With one final push, the final clump of feces was squeezed out of her pucker. She turned around to admire her handiwork, “That’s what you get for being a peeping tom! You won’t be peeking into the girl’s locker room ever again, perv.” She chastised the steaming pile. Fiona looked around for something to use as makeshift toilet paper. Much to her dismay, she was forced to use the bush behind her. Breaking off a branch, she rubbed the pine needles in-between the crack of her plump backside. Fiona was careful to make sure no shit clung to her furry behind or the base of her tail. Once she felt her anus was sufficiently clean, she dropped the soiled branch on top of the smelly remains of Bradley (formally a chihuahua from PE). After adjusting her skirt she turned around to scowl at the horny teen or, more accurately, what was left of him. She tugged down her bottom eyelid and stuck out her tongue, “meh!” Without further ceremony she left to rejoin her friends. Never again would Bradley cross her mind; he was nothing more than fertilizer now, and below her notice.

A good portion of the hunting team (both the hunter and prey divisions) had been waiting for her on the sidewalk. From the hunting team there was Leona, Rhonda, Bruno, and Rudy. From the prey team there was Lin and Jim, the chipmunk twins, Mike the rabbit, and Jason the squirrel. There was one more person accompanying them, but he wasn’t a member of the team. He was just some poor schmuck Leona had grabbed off the street while waiting for Fiona and crammed into her craw. The Possums legs were cart wheeling weakly as Leona worked her way to his torso. She’d taken him in head first from behind, so his genitalia were fully exposed to the group. Rhonda giggled to herself while the boys averted their eyes. Rudy was the first to catch sight of Fiona walking towards them.

“Took you long enough.” Rudy griped.

“So sue me.” Fiona muttered.

“Ummm, aren’t the people who live there going to be angry you took a dump on their lawn?” Rhonda asked, curious. Normally Fiona was very good about manners and proper protocol; she’d never do anything to embarrass Caliban’s hunting team. And yet, she’d just gone onto someone’s property and taken a shit behind one of their bushes.

“Oh, don’t worry. They won’t mind. I know the family who lives here; they’re dung beetles. When they get home later today and see the size of what I left them they’ll think its Christmas!”

“… Ew.” Mike wiggled his bunny nose in distaste. Rhonda just laughed. Fiona had enough class to look embarrassed. Had she really just bragged about the mound of warm stool she’d just deposited on the Krekosky’s lawn? Perhaps Rudy’s crude personality was starting to rub off on her.

The possum in Leona’s mouth gave a shriek that seemed to be somewhere in-between instinctive, guttural terror and ecstasy. She drew his hindquarters into her powerful jaws just as he shot his load. A small amount of cum dribbled from her lips. Leona brought up a paw to block the embarrassing display from view, and sucked in the possum’s tail as if it were a giant noodle. Mike saw Leona’s belly balloon slightly as the man was forced inside of her. Licking off her lips, she gave a light burp, “Whew, it feels good to get something solid in my stomach. Unlike Mike, I don’t need to cough this critter up!” A light scent in the air alerted Leona to Mike’s discomfort. Looking over at him she gave him a friendly smile and a reassuring pat on the back. Mike’s uneasiness melted away. He was surprised to realize he had no misgivings walking beside Leona, even though her belly was currently flopping around with the weak struggles of her latest victim.

Two weeks ago, that could have easily been him sitting in the tight confines of Leona’s gut, waiting to be reduced down into a nutritious protein rich paste. It wasn’t him though and, honestly, he had trouble even envisioning the cute, perky lioness eating him. Sure, there were a lot of people who’d like nothing more than to have his ass on a dinner plate, but he didn’t think the hunting team felt that way about him and the rest of the prey division. Even though Mike and his prey teammate’s were new to the Caliban Academy Hunting Team, he felt as if they’d really started bonding with their carnivore counterparts.

There were no longer any awkward silences before the start of practice. After the first few practices they’d actually tried making small talk with each other. Now, at the start of every meeting, both teams would laugh and joke with each other, talk about classes, and just enjoying each other’s company. Even showering after practice had become a little less awkward, though things were still understandably weird (washing corrosive gunk out of your fur while standing next to the guy who’d just regurgitated you could be more than a little uncomfortable). While everyone was sociable with each other, some people had made more progress than others. Mike was well aware that the seeds for some close friendships had been planted.

Jason almost always got caught by Rhonda, and it was quite clear to Mike that this wasn’t a coincidental happening. At the end of practice Jason always had the distinct smell of tiger girl on him, but it wasn’t the scent of bile Mike’s nose detected. Jason had yet to confide in them what exactly was going on, but Mike had a fairly good idea.

Lin seemed to have a similar relationship with Rudy. She’d been caught by the young wolf an obscene number of times. Once, after Rudy had released her so he could go have a chat with his girlfriend, Mike approached her and offered to team up with her for the remainder of the practice session. Much to his shock, she’d smelled of precum and ball sweat. The little chipmunk had haughtily refused his offer and she’d disappeared back into the woods, presumably to wait for Rudy’s return. Mike wasn’t sure how things were playing out between the two, but he hoped that their relationship was more innocent than it appeared to be. The last thing the prey team needed was for one of its members to come between the co-captains.

The last new friendship of note was actually between Mike and Leona. The lioness caught him quite often though, unlike with his peers, it was never intended on his part. When the practices had first started her favorite tactic had been to leap out of the foliage and attack his flank when he was unaware. He’d often spar with her only to find himself painfully contorted and crammed into her gullet. As of yet, she’d never actually swallowed him. Instead she’d gently nibble on his torso and gum his shoulder blades. While it was quite cramped, Mike didn’t find the experience all that unbearable. In fact, he’d actually started to enjoy it. Much more recently she’d deviated from her normal method of attack. Now whenever she caught sight of him she didn’t even bother stalking. Attacking head on, she’d wrestle him to the ground and give him a wet willie, or tickle his armpits until he begged for mercy. Through their little bouts they’d gotten to know each other better, and had started talking after practice and sometimes even in school. Whenever Mike saw Leona he made sure to wave to her. More than once she’d stopped to talk to him in the halls (causing his herbivorous friends to dart off in different directions). Mike was really starting to like her but he wasn’t sure how she felt to about him. Was he a genuine friend, or just an expendable rabbit she liked to goof with? He wasn’t sure yet; only time would tell.

At the moment, the small group of predators and prey were headed to the Declaw home. Fiona had wanted to jot down some new drills for the next practice, but she wanted team members to have some input.
1411112212122122211.title: Kell offers up some of the juicy details

choices: Kell lets Sheila have her fun without saying anything.
Kell starts growling at her flirting cousin.
14111122121221222111.content:
“I can’t believe you ate him. I mean, I know he sort of insulted you, but you should know better. You know what mole does to you, so why’d you do it?”

“Oh shut up and help me get to your house.”

Mike stifled his laughter as he watched one of his co-captains help the other towards the Dewclaw tree home. Rudy was holding onto Fiona’s side tightly, keeping her from falling over, while she tightly clenched her bulging stomach with both hands. Fiona stumbled several times, but Rudy caught her, earning thankful side looks from Fiona before she flinched in pain. Mike shook his head at his co-captain’s pain, feeling sympathy for her, but having to agree with Rudy that she brought this on herself.

A few minutes ago, they had all been walking together towards the Dewclaw home, talking about school, the team and how they were doing personally. As they were walking, an old, shriveled up mole stepped towards them and went up to Fiona to ask her the time. Fiona had gone off into a rage when the mole asked her the time. Not because of the question, he asked, but the way she addressed her. The mole had mistakenly addressed Fiona as another species due to his bad eyesight. A simple mistake, but it had set the young fox off. It had happened so fast it had seemed like the mole was teleported into Fiona’s gut. One second he was standing there, the next Fiona had a bulging, shaky belly and was glaring hatefully down at it. Then she started getting cramps and needed Rudy’s help walking.

“All he did was say, ‘Miss Rabbit, what time is it.’ Why’d she get so mad?” Mike quietly asked Leona, afraid Fiona might hear him and send him to join the mole in her already cramped gut. Mike may have started to consider his teammates friends, but he was still careful to keep on their good side. Predators were fickle creatures. They were raised to eat you, but can also be your friends. Friendships are hard to keep when your breed is considered lunch.

Leona looked amusingly down at Mike. She had forgotten he was prey and didn’t fully understand how predator culture works. “Calling someone a rabbit is considered a huge insult to a predator. The mole most likely mistook Fiona for a rabbit, but it still stands that he called her one. Saying a predator’s a rabbit is like calling them cowardly, weak and timid. No offense.”

“None taken,” Mike chuckled softly. He knew how his people were perceived and didn’t feel insulted at all to learn his race was used as an affront between predators, mostly because his race were mostly cowardly, weak and timid. Rabbits were not tough; most of them were scrawny, short and frightened, making them at the near bottom of the food chain. It was a simple reality that rabbits along with mice and deer were the most common form of food to predators because they rarely fought back. Mike could count on one paw the number of rabbits he’s met who wouldn’t scream like cowards at the first sign of danger. Speaking of which, one of the oddity rabbits was standing right in front of him.

“Hello kids, how was school?” Asked Kevin Dewclaw, husband to Kell, adopted father to Lindesfarne, stepfather to Rudy, father to Coney and one of the biggest, toughest rabbits most animals have ever seen. You have to be tough to marry a wolf.

He had just arrived home from running some errands and was about to go inside. Kell had said they were having her cousin over and she wanted to introduce him to her. When Kevin had asked what she was like, all Kell had done was smile and say she was ‘interesting’ in an absentminded tone. After hearing that, Kevin wasn’t sure if meeting her was going to be so great. Interesting predators either tended to try and eat him, which made things very awkward. It is so hard to have a civil conversation with someone after they try to gobble you down.

“Hi Kevin, bye Kevin!” Rudy quickly said as he led Fiona into the house as quick as he could. Her groaning had become louder and loud, wet gurgling sounds could be heard from inside her stomach. By the time Rudy was at the door, he was practically carrying Fiona in his arms towards his room. Kevin watched them rush by with a raised eyebrow. He turned perplexed towards the rest of the hunting team, who were standing on the front lawn as they’re co-captain’s raced off.

“What was that about?”

“Um, Fiona ate a mole and they don’t agree with her. Something about them make her very…unwell,” Bruno explained nervously, finding the subject matter bothersome. Kevin looked at Rudy’s best friend blankly for a minute before his eyes widened in understanding.

“Oh! I understand! Kell’s the same way when she eats baboon. First she’s alright, then she gets cramps, then her insides start gurgling and then…well…lets just say thankfully there is always a bottle of Pepto-Bismol in our room.”

Mike, Jason and Lin all cringed at the unnecessary info about Mrs. Dewclaw, none of the prey team wanted to think about their co-captain’s mother’s digestive problems. Apparently, they were the only ones because all the predators on the team nodded and smiled in complete understanding. When it came to discussing the full digestive process, no subject was considered in appropriate between predators. They were a breed that revealed in the eating, digesting and expelling of prey. Crude behavior between them was commonplace. Some were more reserved like Fiona, but most liked to belch and fart and laugh about it. There was even a yearly competition between the nations top predators to determine who could make the biggest dump. The Crapathon was a big yearly event, but it wasn’t known by many prey species because it wasn’t promoted heavily and it was on pay-per-view.

“It might be a little bit until Fiona’s feeling alright, why don’t you all come in and I’ll see if we have something in the house for you to eat. I think there’s some left over bison from the other night.”

“Mmmmmm bison,” Leona purred and Mike rolled his eyes. Leona still had a potbelly from her possum snack from earlier on and now she was hungry for more. Something that Mike had learned from hanging out with predators was that they were constantly hungry and never turned down food, ever. The over eating didn’t bother Mike, but what he couldn’t get was where they all put it. Predators eat creatures more then half their size everyday, having their bellies bulge out several feet, yet after they digest their meals, they don’t gain an once of fat. Mike had seen fat predators before though, but they were massive over eaters. Dinning on ten times their weight in prey everyday. It was crazy how much even the average predator ate and it helped sink in for Mike how insatiable predators are.

“Got anything for the non-flesh eater?” Jason asked and Min nodded in agreement. All the places the team went to eat between games only catered to predators so the prey team often was left without a meal while their predator counterparts got to eat. It wasn’t that big of a deal, but it was an annoyance nonetheless.

“I may have some fresh leaves, nuts and berries in the fridge inside,” Kevin supplied and got a big smile from all the more often than not hungry prey team members.

“Lets grab something to eat then,” Mike exclaimed and everyone walked into the Dewclaw home. It was a nice, large tree, perfect for the large, diverse family. All of the team had been there before and knew the way to the kitchen, but they let Kevin led them. Kevin was all smiles to the team, not worried about all the predators he was letting into his house. They were all Rudy’s friends and seemed too polite to try to eat their host. Kevin wasn’t blind to how delicious he was and how most of the people his wife and stepson associated with would like nothing better then to eat him. But he took it all in stride, it took a lot for him to get tense.

“Hello Beautiful.”

Kevin stopped abruptly as he stepped into the kitchen and staring blankly at a near identical clone of his wife standing in the kitchen. He knew he wasn’t looking at his wife because this wolf was wearing more make up then Kell would ever wear and his darling wife was sitting a few feet away from the clone. This wasn’t his wife, but as he stared at her, he noticed something in her eyes he had seen many times in Kell’s stare. Whenever he got alone with Kell and she was in the mood, a fervent, burning look appeared in her eyes at made his knees tremble. That hot, passionate look she’d give him was so sexy and was what he thought of when he was with her. It was that predatory stare that always signified the fun was going to start and he was in for a lot of pleasure.

This clone of his wife was giving him an identical look.

“Kevin, I’d like you to meet Sheila, Kell’s cousin,” Elanor said; unable to see the seductive look in Sheila’s eyes as she gazed at Kevin. Kevin looked wildly around, first at his wife who was sipping on coffee at the table and then to Sheila who was smiling playfully at him. Catching his eye, she winked and let her tongue come out and run along her crimson red lips. Kevin quickly looked away.

Under his breath, so no one, not even the hearing sensitive wolfs could hear, he muttered to himself, “This will not end well.”

“So your Kevin,” Sheila practically purred. A skill not easy for any canine to do. Reaching out, Shelia lightly traced her fingers down Kevin’s biceps. “Kell told me how…big you are, but I thought for sure she was embellishing. Now I see she understanding how… massive you are.”

Kevin gulped. If it wasn’t obvious by her sultry tone that Shelia was not referring to his height when she said he was big and massive, then how her eyes zeroed in between his legs was all Kevin needed to know.

Behind Kevin, the two teams watched what was going on silently. Forgetting about their hunger as they watched the drama unfold. “We should head upstairs,” Mike quietly said, wanting to avoid the drama going on and avoid a certain person. Elanor hadn’t spotted him with the group and Mike wanted to keep it that way. Elanor tended to grope him whenever he was nearby and he didn’t want that happening, especially with Leona around. He wasn’t sure how the lioness felt about him, but if she saw another female manhandle him, any romantic intentions would be squashed and he might end up her meal instead of the bison.

As the prey and predator teams silently and quickly vacated, Kevin was left alone with his wife, his stepmother and a wolf that was currently eyeing him like a three-course meal. Being seen as food was nothing new for Kevin, but from the way Sheila was looking at him, he could tell she wanted to eat him nice, slow and very messily. She was practically undressing him with her eyes and it was making Kevin very uncomfortable. However, being lusted over wasn’t what made him uneasy, being lusted over by his wives cousin on the other hand was making him tense. How was Kell going to react, with jealousy, anger or was she going to ignore it. Kell had told him that she was all right with other women looking at him, but no one could touch him without her permission. Kevin could keep levelheaded around his wives sultry double, but could she do the same?
14111122121221222111.title: Converging on the Dewclaw Residence

choices: She reveals Rudy's betrayal and stoically eats him
She gropes him and tastes him, while giving him relationship advice
141111221212212221111.content:
"He’s quite the hunk, Kell.” Sheila’s voice was light and cheery. To the other girls her flirting was merely play; Kevin, however, had eye contact with the frisky she-wolf, and he knew lust when he saw it. Sheila draped an arm around Kevin’s shoulder and leaned inward,” You know Kevin, I've always had something of an... attraction to rabbits.”

“So I’ve heard. That’s actually the reason we never asked you to babysit Coney.” Kevin replied, a bemused look on his face.

Sheila had enough tact to look embarrassed, “It’s true I went through a phase where bunnies were my prey of choice.” Sheila confessed.

“Choice? They were the only thing you’d eat.” Kell quipped, feeling some measure of satisfaction in Sheila’s apparent discomfort.

“Er… Well, yes, but that had more to do with where I was living at the time. There was a rabbit burrow near my apartment, and I’d just given up on vegetarianism.” Sheila turned back to Kevin, “I was a little more ravenous than usual that year, and your kind really knows how to fill a girl up. I just wasn’t motivated to hunt too far away from home; not when I had such a readily available source of prey nearby.”

Reaching out, Sheila placed a hand on Kevin’s thigh. Ever so lightly, she began to stroke it. The subtle movement was lost on both Kell and her mother. It took all of Kevin’s self control to keep from recoiling. Normally he had no trouble stoically ignoring the affections of other women, but the wolf sitting next to him was practically a dead ringer for his wife.

“Like all predators I have my appetites, and I can’t deny that I enjoy having a big strong man fill me up.”

Kevin felt a trickle of sweat roll down his brow. Thankfully, it was hidden by his snow white fur. Kevin was growing increasingly uncomfortable. He couldn’t determine whether Sheila’s comments were laced with innuendo or not. She was border line flirting with him… but he wasn’t sure if that was because she found him arousing, or delectable. Maybe she found him to be both. Some predators enjoyed fucking their meals before devouring them and, based on Sheila’s aesthetics and mannerisms, Kevin suspected Kell’s cousin was one such pred.

“Careful Sheila, you know that Kevy is all mine.” Kell said in a tone that was light hearted and yet somehow serious at the same time.

“Does that mean there’ll be no ménage à trois?” Sheila asked innocently.

“What do you think?”

“You’re such a prude, Kell.”

…………………………………………………………………………

Rudy stepped out of his bedroom and shut the door behind him, “Let’s give Fiona some peace and quiet while she digests her food.” Even with the door closed, the predator and prey teams could clearly hear the pained moans of their co-captain.

“Poor dear.” Leona said sympathetically, “I hate stomach cramps.”

“I hope she feels better soon.” Lin chipped in. Her mildly sarcastic tone made it quite clear she wanted the exact opposite. Leona snickered and Mike shifted uncomfortably. Their lupine co-captain just ignored the jealous chipmunk.

“We can head to Lindesfarne’s room,” Rudy suggested, “though she might have a few bug kids running around in there.”

Rudy knew that at least one firefly kid, a boy named Ace, had survived his step sister’s wild binge eating. He’d likely survive a few days more, perhaps even for a couple of weeks. Lindesfarne had mentioned she was interested in trying ‘free range’ dining. Rudy had been a little shocked that his nerdy, selfless sister would try something so fearless and (potentially) cruel. While Rudy had never tried it himself, he was aware of what it entailed. At one point he actually suspected his mother of marrying Kevin for the free rang dining experience, but as the years went by he realized her affection for the big bunny was legit.

Free Range dining was always a little bit risky because it involved ignoring one of hunting’s most important principles: don’t talk to your intended target. It required you to capture your prey instead of messily devouring them; not an easy feat depending on the size of your victim. After, you’d keep the victim captured anywhere from a few days to a few weeks. Sometimes prey would even be kept for months.

Predators who engage in free range kidnappings on a regular basis claim that it helps heighten the meal, because you get to know your prey intimately. After a few days time, your unwilling guest will start to become less panicky and more cordial with you. They’ll start to divulge their hopes, their dreams, where they grew up, who they took to prom, etc. During their incarceration at your home, if you’re really lucky, a mutual trust can form between the two of you. Breaking that trust, or getting a prey species to willingly sacrifice themself to your gut, is supposedly one of the most delicious and rewarding moments a predator can ever experience.

Of course, free ranging has its naysayers. Many predators have given it a go only to leave with a bitter taste in their mouth, and no small degree of guilt. Getting to know too much about your prey can lead to feelings of empathy, and even sympathy for them. In more than one instance a predator has gone on to marry a potential meal. Also in more than one instance, a predator has been emotionally scarred after finally devouring their houseguest. Rudy knew one hawk, a senior at school, who had actually turned to vegetarianism after a traumatic free range experience.

“I’d rather we go somewhere else, if that’s alright.” Jim murmured. He really didn’t like being around people he knew were slated for death.

“Yeah, isn’t there someplace more private around here?” Jason asked, sneaking a peak up Rhonda’s skirt. The giant cat playfully swatted him in the face with her tail.

“The only other place we could head is outside… You know, the terrain is a bit different in my backyard than at school. Maybe we could do a few more hunting drills before we call it a day.”

“Could we just do catch and release, captain?” Jim asked. He’d already showered once that day, and he wasn’t looking forward to revisiting Bruno’s mouth, or anyone else’s for that matter.

“Sure! We’ll do catch and release for half an hour. The field of play… hmmm, let’s make it small. How about just a one mile radius, with my house being the center point?” Everyone nodded, “Okay, good. After that we’ll call it a day and I’ll head back in to check on Fiona.”

“Sounds like a plan” Leona said cheerily, “…Well, get a move on Mike!” Gyrating her hips, Leona slammed her backside into Mike, causing the startled bunny boy to stumble towards the stairs. Rhonda scooped up Steve and set him on her shoulder. The two teams made their way back downstairs and through the kitchen.

This time Mike wasn’t able to avoid detection. The moment they entered the kitchen, Elanor’s nostrils flared. She looked up at Mike, a surprised yet pleased smile on her muzzle. Mike smiled weakly and gave her a half-hearted wave. The exchange wasn’t lost on Rudy, though everyone else, including Leona, had either missed or ignored it. Without exchanging pleasantries the teams filed out into the Dewclaw’s backyard, and began stretching for their second practice session of the day.

………………………………….

Mike flushed the toilet and went to wash his hands.

Practice had been pretty good. Once more Leona had been the one to track him down. Because it was only catch and release this time, he’d been spared being crammed into her gob. Instead they’d rolled on the ground wrestling. For the whole of their one-sided sparring match, Mike’s head had been sandwiched in Leona’s cleavage. Despise losing completely it hadn’t been a bad experience, Mike reflected. The more time he spent with the powerful predator, the more smitten he became. How did she feel about him though? She was very friendly and playful, but was that with everyone or just him?

Turning of the faucet, Mike ran his hands through his fur. Still thinking heavily about his relationship with his lioness teammate, he stepped out into the hall… and into Elanor’s chest.

“Uf!” Mike fell on his keister. Elanor extended a paw and helped him to his feet.

She gazed at him with predatory gleam in her eye, all the talk she’d heard about fucking rabbits had gotten her flustered.

“It’s good to see you again, Mike. Mind if we chat in my room for a while?”

Mike didn’t mind at all; he genuinely liked the older woman. The only reason he’d been uncomfortable in the kitchen was because of Leona’s presence. He knew Elanor had a bit of a crush on him, and she often wasn’t very subtle about it. If something embarrassing had transpired in front of the athletic lioness it might have ruined his future chances at a date, “Sure, Elanor. I’d like that.”

He followed her into her room and she planted herself in her favorite chair. She patted her lap, indicating he should hop on. Mike slid up onto her powerful thighs and wiggled to get comfortable. Because this was becoming routine for the young bunny, Mike didn’t have a clue how much danger he was in.

His brief interaction with Elanor in the kitchen had had dramatic, unforeseen consequences. Rudy, long aware of his grandmother’s infatuation with his rabbit team mate, had finally come to a decision he’d been struggling with for nearly a week. After practice had ended he’d pulled Elanor aside and given her permission to eat Mike at her leisure. Mike had gone from being a teammate to being a gift.

Rudy’s betrayal had been prompted by several things. He knew his grandmother’s hunger (though this time he hadn’t realized there was a sexual aspect to it) and he knew how devoted she was to bringing down her prey. Elanor and Kell had both promised not to eat any members of the prey team during the hunting season, but Rudy had little doubt what would happen to Mike after the last competition had ended. By allowing Elanor to eat Mike now, he was merely speeding up the inevitable. It would probably be for the best. The longer he remained outside of Elanor’s stomach, the more he’d bond with the team. Fortunately, his absence wouldn’t hurt the prey team’s membership. Mike had been looking at internships in the mayor’s office which might have taken him off the team, and there was now a small backlog of prey willing to try out for position on the prey team.

Elanor gazed down at the bunny snuggling into her lap. As she did a small trail of drool unintentionally dribbled down her chin. Though Mike didn’t know it, he was now officially her property, to do with as she pleased. She wasn’t sure what to do with him though. She’d grown quite fond of Mike, he was a good listener, and despite her long accomplished career as a predator, gobbling him down without warning would make her feel a tiny bit guilty. Truth be told she’d much rather fuck him first and decide his fate afterwards, but that was no longer an option for the old wolf gal. Rudy had detected her interest in Mike, so a sexual relationship (like the one she’d started with Mike’s older brother Jeff) was probably out of the question.

So what should she do with the delectable gift in her lap? Devour him or, as much as it would pain her, let him go?

“So what do you want to talk about Elanor?” Mike smiled up at her as he leaned back against her trim belly.
141111221212212221111.title: Kell lets Sheila have her fun

1411112212122122211112.content:
“Why don’t you start by telling me more about this lioness teammate of yours, Leona?” Elanor curiously asked Mike as she ran her paws down his sides. Hearing the horny wolf mention his semi-girlfriend made Mike a little nervous. He didn’t know how Elanor would take him being interested in another female predator. The mind of female predators was a mystery to him, but he knew that they had strong emotions and that was enough to worry him. Would she be jealous, hurt or just really, really pissed. He sincerely hoped that she hadn’t become too attached to him or things might get messy.

Elanor was actually attached to him, but that wasn’t a bad thing for Mike, it was a very good thing for the oblivious rabbit. Elanor was not enough to be jealous and not too little to want to eat him. She liked the scrappy rabbit and not just because he was cute and easy to grope. He was a nice kid, respective of his elders and not afraid to look beyond species stereotypes. He kind of reminded Elanor of Kevin, a much smaller, scrawnier Kevin, but Kevin just the same. He had that same spunk that made her approve of Kevin’s marriage to her daughter.

She wanted to see Mike happy, find himself a nice girl and settle down with and maybe after he filled out a little, she could meet up with him again and let him ride her old, but still sturdy bones. But she had to let him go, not only so he could grow up, but to prevent herself from doing something wrong. She liked Mike, but he was so appetizing. One night they might be talking, she might be a little tired and the wolf inside her could take over. All it would take is a few minutes and he’d be gone. Her body would digest him in less time then it took to eat him and the next time she would see Mike would be when she was pushing him out her anus. That wasn’t going to happen, tonight would be the last time she was alone with Mike, the last time she’d grope him, the last time she’d tease him. This was her last time with Mike, so she had to make it special.

Having gotten no response from the boy seated on her lap, Elanor ran her paws up his thighs, making his breath get caught in his throat. She could see his manhood hardening inside his pants and she grinned devilishly. She’d loosen up Mike yet. “Come on Mike, tell me all about her.”

Mike gulped, trying to stay still as Elanor’s paws rubbed dangerously close to his crotch. It was hard to believe that such soft paws had gripped prey bigger then him and crammed it down Elanor’s throat. Taking a breath, Mike mustered up the courage to speak. “Leona is on the predator team at school. She an expert tracker and aggressor, able to take down prey twice her size. Her primary prey is a large mammal including dear and wild boar. She’s turning sixteen in May and looking to get into a good college. Her favorite food is antelope and she enjoys hunting in open space. Her top speed is thirty miles and hour and she can leap six feet in the air. Her favorite hunting spot is…”

Elanor interrupted him right there. “I want to hear what you think about her, not what it says in your year book about her.”

“Right,” Mike deadpanned, heavily sweating as he thought about what to say. He figured it was best to tell the truth and get it over with. If Elanor wasn’t the jealous type, he might just make it out of the room unscathed. “She’s a really funny, nice lioness I meet a few weeks back. She treats me with more respect then a lot of the other predators on the team and has even offered me help with training to escape from the predator team. She’s really easy going, yet when she wants something she’ll work hard to get it. Whenever I’m with her I feel both really happy to be able to be with her and proud to say I’m friends with such a great Lioness.”

Elanor smiled, not the malicious grin she had when teasing Mike, but a genuine happy smile. Mike was so honest and up front, seeing past Leona as a predator. To Mike it doesn’t matter if Leona was a rabbit or a lion, he’d still be smitten with her. Although if she was a bunny, getting into her pants would be much more easy.

“I really like her,” Mike admitted after a second to collect his thought. “But I’m not sure if she likes me. Why would someone as cool and tough as Leona go for a wimpy rabbit like me. I’m a loser.”

“Mike!” Elanor loudly admonished. Unexpectedly, she spun Mike around in her lap, putting his face right in front of hers. Mike stared at her long muzzle, wondering what he had said to upset her. Before he could even start worrying about his death, Elanor crush him to her chest, giving him a big heartfelt hug. “Don’t call yourself a loser. You’re a sweet young man that doesn’t know how sweet he is. If Leona doesn’t see it then it’s her lose. You’ll find a good girl, be it predator or prey, you’ll see.”

“Thanks,” Mike whispered softly, wrapping his own arms around Elanor. This was nice. He had never been hugged before, not like this at least. He had been groped, smothered and squeezed, but never given an honest to God hug. There was nothing sexual about this, just warmth and support. Mike closed his eyes, wishing this would never end.

Just then, the door opened.

“Excuse me auntie, I’m heading over to my hotel and I wanted to see when we could meet tomorrow?”

The hug between rabbit and world ended abruptly. Breaking apart, Elanor and Mike stared across the room to see a face heavily coated in mascara and lipstick poking out from the ajar room. The pair stared wordlessly at Sheila, not sure what to say to her right now. Neither had ever thought someone would catch them like this, especially in a tender moment. Both of them were taken aback, unable to say anything.

Unfazed by the sight of her elderly aunt in the arms of a rabbit nearly half her own age, Sheila calmly started to leave. “Sorry Auntie, thought you were alone. I’ll just come back around lunch, that should give you enough time to clean the sheets and any mess you cause. Catch you later.” Pulling her head back, Sheila slowly started to close the door. However, she couldn’t resist offering one more remark. “By the way, nice find auntie. The young ones have so much energy and they go down so good. Tomorrow we can go to the elementary school and pick you up a nooner. Ciao!”

The door closed, but Elanor and Mike remained where they were. A heavy blush was on both of their faces from being caught together by the promiscuous she-wolf. Finally, the silence was broken by a soft chuckle let out by Mike.

“So, do I have to worry about losing you to some kindergarten stud?”

They both burst into hysterical laughter, finding the stupid joke hilarious under the circumstances. Each of them was so grateful it was Sheila that found them and not someone else. If Rudy had caught Mike, things would have gotten very awkward on the field. Nothing makes things uncomfortable like finding a teammate in the arms of your granny. Elanor was just thankful it wasn’t her daughter or son-in-law. Being found with a rabbit would have brought too many questions. The last thing she wanted was her daughter thinking she was sexually interested in rabbits, especially with her husband being one.

“Hilarious,” Mike deadpanned as his laughter subsided. “I better get going. The rest of the team is waiting for me and I don’t want anyone getting curious about where I’ve been.”

Mike tried to get off Elanor’s lap, but the wolf was too quickly. Her paw lashed out, grabbing one of the rabbits ears and holding him in place on her comfy lap. Mike turned to Elanor, confusion written all over his face. Elanor just grinned at him, a toothy, cruel grin that set Mikes teeth on edge. Her other arm went out and reached around Mike’s body, pulling him closer to her. This was no comforting hug, no innocent gesture, this was something much more immoral.

“We’re going to have a little chat Mickey,” Elanor throatily whispered to the rabbit tightly pressed against her furry body. Mike squirmed at the sound of Elanor’s voice, but remained trapped. Her hold on him was too tight. “I’m going to pass on some womanly advice to help you snag your crush. I’m going to tell you how to make a woman happy in more then one way. Consider this a gift to you my little rabbit friend. I’m going to show you all the ways to please a woman. All the ways.”

As Mike remained still, lost in thought over the ominous words, Elanor reflected on how right this was. She’d teach Mike a few tips to achieve his happiness with Leona and get a good time. She’d have to cut off meeting with Mike after this, give him a chance to get better acquainted with Leona, but she was ready for that. She wanted him happy and leaving him with Leona was how he was going to achieve that. If someone had told Elanor she’d be concerned about a rabbits happiness a few years ago she would have laughed at whoever told her this and ate them for even suggesting it. A few years later, under the same roof as several different prey species and Elanor was different. Now she was able to relate to prey, allow herself to feel for them. She still scarfed them down and thought of them as food, but she was now able to connect with them. She’d never start eating greens and never eat a rabbit again, but she was now capable of caring for a species other then her own. And in this world, isn’t that the best you can expect?


<><><><><><><><& #62;<><><><><><><><& #62;<><><><><><><><& #62;<><><>


A very frantic Fiona searched for the only thing that could save her. The mole she’d eaten earlier was still causing her a lot of pain and suffer, not to mention embarrassment. The whole team had heard her insides gurgle, giving them a good idea of what her insides were like. Fiona had rushed tried to wait out her indigestion in Rudy’s room, but the problem persisted. In desperate need of help, she took a chance and went in search of a remedy. Luckily, she remembered Rudy saying that his parents always kept some Pepto-Bismol in their bedroom.

“Bingo.” With a sudden rush delight, Fiona spotted the pink bottle. She had been searching in the Rudy’s parent’s closet, pushing aside cloths in search of the elusive bottle. She had found some interesting things while she searched, including a little red ridding hood costume. She didn’t even begin to guess what that was for.

Grabbing the Pepto-Bismol off the top shelf, Fiona uncapped it and started guzzling the whole thing down. The wet sloshing sounds coming from inside her stopped as she finished downed the whole bottle in on gulp. Her insides unclenched a soft sigh escaped her lips. Wiping her muzzle with back of her paw, Fiona relaxed slightly, now feeling a hundred times better. She really had to watch what she ate from now on, not everything can be food, even if it insults you. Now in good health, Fiona started to get out of the Dewclaw matron’s closet. She had to leave quickly, if she was caught sneaking around in Rudy’s parent’s bedroom she’d be in trouble.

Click.

At the sound of the door opening, Fiona used her well-earned skills to leap back into the closet and quickly closed it before she was spotted. Stepping back, she peered out through gaps in the closet door to see who had come into the room. She held her breath as she spied out, praying it was just one of Rudy’s parents coming in to grab something. She couldn’t let herself be seen, not after pilfering Rudy’s mother’s medicine and hiding in her closet. Watching silently, she looked to see who had come into the room.
1411112212122122211112.title: Unknowingly Saved

choices: Child Protective Services learn of Aby and Danny; they check up on them.
Mike asks Leona out on a date while she's stalking freshmen.
14111122121221222111122.content:
Much to Fiona's chagrin, Kell and Kevin spilled into the bedroom. She stifled a curse as she saw the state her boyfriend's parents were in; she wasn't going to be leaving any time soon. Kell had her legs wrapped around Kevin's waist as she pressed herself into his chest. Kevin chuckled lightly when Kell's tongue suddenly penetrated one of his large, floppy ears. It began to explore inquisitively, lightly poking the delicate instrument and coating it in saliva. "You seem friskier than usual hon... Not that I'm complaining." Kevin gave his wife a wry smile.

Kell didn't bother replying. Deciding she wanted more of her hubby's distinctive flavor, she playfully sucked the tip of his one, limp ear into her elongated maw and began nibbling it playfully. Kell's claws dug into his back and her powerful thighs squeezed his sides with renewed relish as the horny she-wolf sought to strengthen her grip on her 'prey'. Kevin winced, but quickly smiled. The claws weren't enough to draw blood, but they were sure to leave tiny puncture wounds beneath Kevin's thin layer of white fur. Reaching his destination, Kevin fell forward with the full force of his weight. Kell's back impacted with the mattress as Kevin toppled on top of her. She let out a startled yelp as the air was momentarily forced from her lungs.

Despite her current predicament, Fiona couldn't help but smile. The Declaws apparently liked their lovemaking a little on the rough side. While Fiona had initially been worried the interspecies couple might come to the closet for what she assumed was their 'role-play' gear, it soon became abundantly clear they had no such intention. Realizing she wouldn't be able to leave before the excited, older couple was finished with their lovemaking; Fiona stretched her limbs and sat down to enjoy the show.

Detangling her legs from around his waist, Kell used her sharp hind claws to slash through Kevin's belt. Sure, he'd have to buy a replacement, but she was feeling too ravenous to care. After her naughty, detailed talk with her mother, cousin and next-door neighbor, Kell had an insatiable hunger for rabbit. In a few seconds she'd plunge her meaty hubby into her drooling mouth; he didn't have anything to fear, however. While the mouth she wanted to feed Kevin to was indeed hot, wet and hungry, it was also toothless. In addition to that, it was only hungry for a particular part of his lower anatomy (though it had consumed the more rigid of his two ears on more than one occasion).

Kell used her furry toes to grip Kevin's belt loops and tug down his jeans. A few seconds later his tighty-whitey underwear followed. She gave him a toothy grin, then shimmied backwards across the bed cover until her back was pressed up against the headboard. She spread her legs wide, and pointed a claw to her hungry nether lips, "Get to work." she ordered, with a throaty growl.

"Yes ma'am!" Kevin replied, all too happy to fulfill his wife's desire.

Watching from in-between the gaps in the closet door, Fiona grinned. It was nice to see the spark hadn't gone out of the Dewclaw’s relationship. Despite their many years of marriage, and the raising of three children, it seemed Mrs. Dewclaw still grew hungry for bedroom intimacy, and Mr. Declaw was still more than willing to reinforce the rabbit stereotype. As Kevin straddled Kell's legs, Fiona was given an unobstructed view of his package. The sight was so awe inspiring for the young teen, she couldn't help but gasp in surprise. It seemed Kevin's libido wasn't the only gargantuan thing attributable to him. Fiona felt a sudden surge of envy, lamenting on how Rudy wasn't related to Kevin by blood. While Rudy had never failed to satisfy her, having Kevin's... 'assets' and instinctual bunny drive to reproduce certainly wouldn't have detracted from their make out sessions. Of course, on the other paw, if he'd come out looking like Coney there was a good chance she would have never hooked up with him. Realistically, she probably would have devoured him long before ever considering the prospect of going on a date with him.

Kevin's sensitive ears gave a twitch as he heard what sounded like a sudden exhale, "Honey, did you hear something?" He asked, looking to the closet.

Fiona's blood suddenly went cold. What would Mrs. Declaw do if she caught a peeping tom in her closet? Would it matter that Fiona was Rudy's girlfriend, or would she be treated like any other voyeur? To Fiona's relief, Kell was for more interested in the task at hand than sniffing out the source of a mysterious sound. Gripping Kevin's head, she turned his face back to hers and drew him inward. She cocked her head to the side and slowly parted her jaws. Taking a hint, Kevin did likewise. Sucking her long pink tongue into his mouth, Kevin deftly repositioned himself and began exploring one of his wife's lower orifices as well.

As the two started rocking back and forth, Fiona relaxed... or at least she tried to. The sudden rush of adrenaline and fear had caused her belly to do a summersault. The Pepto-Bismol had yet to fully take effect, and the sudden wave of nausea threatened to liberate Fiona's past meals, expelling them onto the carpeted floor of the Dewclaw’s closet. While the duo were too horny to investigate strange, bodiless gasps, they'd most certainly discover Fiona if she started vomiting all over the place. Not only would the gagging be loud, but Fiona was sure the resulting smell of half digested mole mixed with remnants of Chihuahua wouldn't be very pleasing for Kell's sensitive nose.

Fortunately for her, after clamping a paw over her muzzle and concentrating for half a minute, Fiona was able to resist the urge and the nauseous feeling soon dissipated. Fiona breathed slowly and deliberately, allowing her better control over the faculties and desires of her body. She used to take pictures for the school paper; she was a master at blending into her surroundings, and making herself invisible to the naked eye. The time she spent as co-captain of the hunting time had only made her more proficient at sneaking and spying. Despite being sick (and being taken by surprise by the length and plumpness of Kevin's gear) she shouldn't have exposed herself. She'd have to start re-practicing the fundamentals asap... for now though, she had to wait for the Declaws to tire themselves out.

After what seemed like fifteen minutes of pure ramming, Kevin withdrew his member from in-between Kell's legs. To Fiona's shock, it was still erect and ready to go. This time though she was in the right frame of mind, and she prevented herself from making even so much as a peep. Kell rolled over onto her tummy and flexed her furry butt cheeks, causing each to bounce individually. Gripping the backs of his wife's shoulders, Kevin leaned inward once more. The tantalizing cheeks parted as Kevin's rod went delving into the wolfess' crack. Kell dug her claws into the sheets and arched her back, releasing a cross between a whimper and a howl, as Kevin began dipping in and out of her anus.

'Kinky' Fiona thought, 'if they keep this up though I'm liable to be here all night.'

............................................................................ ......................................

Rudy strolled back into the house, a self-satisfied grin plastered onto his muzzle. He didn't have to go hunting very far to find dinner. A young duck and her two, plump children had foolishly been pilfering Kevin's crops when Rudy came up on them. Rudy had made a meal of the mother and let the kids go free. His seemingly altruistic gesture wasn't mercy though. He was just too full to stomach them. Truth be told, many predators would peg his actions as cruel. Young could hardly be expected to survive in such a dangerous society without a vigilant, parental figure to look after them. There was a chance social services would pick them up but odds were that Aby would get them first. Aby was quite big on birds, and actually accepted them as payment for auto services in addition to mice and actual monetary currency.

Snatching up a tooth pick, Rudy began prodding the gaps between his teeth. A feather was lodging between two of his canines but with a little jiggling, he managed to pop it out. He spat the saliva drenched feather into the sink, then grinned down at his slightly bloated middle, "Thanks for the meal, lady. I've been tasting meat all day and it's really a relief to have something solid in my stomach... *Brrrrrrrrrrrrrraaaaap!!!!*"

The belly shifted as the poor mother's air supply was rudely expelled. Rudy could hear her clucking hysterically, but he didn't pay it much mind. She was either pleading for releasing or begging him to spare her children; Nothing he hadn't heard a thousand times before. Prey were nothing if not predictable. Of course, he couldn't be too critical of them. If he was stuffed into a wet, slimy sack and slowly basted in acid, bile, and god knows what else, he'd probably start begging for his life too.

"You're not getting out of me... at least not the way you came in. There is one way I can help you out though." Rudy began to vigorously massage and knead the ball in his gut. He could feel the duck woman's wings expanding and fluttering in response as he continued rotating and smooshing his pliable, furry belly flesh. His harsh rubbing was sure to cause all the fluids sloshing around within him to cover his prey completely. It would also help work them into her feathers, so that they could begin their task of breaking her down.

"There, now you'll digest faster and there'll be less pain. You're welcome." Rudy wasn't normally this kind to prey. It wasn't like him to talk to his victims or to ease their passage through his digestive tract but he was feeling a bit more appreciative of his meal's sacrifice than usual. Maybe it had to do with his recent betrayal of Mike. He'd felt bad about handing his teammate over to his grandmother, even though he knew the older woman would have eaten him eventually.

"Damn prey team." Rudy muttered under his breath, "They're making me soft."

Just then, Mike came bounding into the kitchen, looking quite flushed and grinning from one long ear to the next. Rudy's shades slid down his snout and his eyes grew to be the size of saucers. Was he seeing a ghost?

"Oh, hi Rudy... I, erm... never mind, I'll see you at practice tomorrow!" The flustered, sweaty looking rabbit made a sprint for the door. He took one step outside before pausing and rotating to face his co-captain. He didn't make eye contact, as doing so would somehow incriminate him in a crime, "I... I just wanted to let you know I won't be taking that internship at the mayor's office. I decided that I need to be more dedicated to the prey team."

"That's... good. You didn't bump into my grandmother upstairs, did you?" Rudy asked, confused as to why Mike wasn't traveling through the older wolf's intestines right now.

"E-E-Elanor?! Why no... I mean... y-yeah, I did. We just talked, that's all. Is... is there a problem with that?" Mike looked over his shoulder nervously, as if he was debating whether or not to make a break for it.

"No, I was just asking." Rudy frowned, puzzled by the usually calm rabbit's abnormal, stuttering speech and jittery body movements. Had he somehow managed to dodge his grandmother and escape downstairs? He knew she wasn't as agile as she used to be... but he didn't hear her coming down the steps so that probably wasn't it. Rudy, being the apathetic teen he is, decided he just wouldn't worry about. If Elanor chose to postpone eating him for whatever reason, or decided she wasn't interested in eating him at all, that wasn't his business, "So... I suppose we won't need to find a replacement for you on the team? That's good."

"Yeah, you don't need to worry about that. I wouldn't want to let down Leona and Elanor... uh... I mean the team."

"Riiiight." Rudy's eyes narrowed, "Well, I'll see you tomorrow then."

"Okay, later!" And with that Mike sped out into the Dewclaw’s yard, not even bothering to shut the door behind him.

"Weird, I wonder what that was all about."

Heading upstairs he was greeted by another strange sight. He spotted Fiona, who was supposed to be lying down, fighting her indigestion, sneaking out of his parent's bedroom. She didn't notice him right away as she slowly squeezed through a thin opening in the door. She slowly and silently closed it, then tiptoed backwards as if she were afraid the doorknob would metamorph into a serpent and attack her.

"You feeling any better, Fiona?"

His girlfriend went rigid as if he'd just tossed a bucket of ice water on her.

"I-I-I... um... yes, much better. I- I've got to be going now, Rudy. I'll see you at school tomorrow!" Not waiting for Rudy's reply, Fiona sped down the stairwell and out the front door.

Rudy pulled of his cap and scratched his fur, now more than a little confused, "What the hell is going on?... Eh, I don't care. I'm just going to go listen to some Death Fang." With a little more initiative Rudy knew he might be able to uncover what had happened with Mike and Fiona, but with a belly full of duck he was more interested in just crashing in his room and listening to music.

.......................................................................

*2 weeks later*
14111122121221222111122.title: It's both Kevin and Kell

choices: "If there are any rules against dating a teammate."
"If it's alright if she ate Mike."
141111221212212221111222.content:
Mike had been trying to muster up the courage to ask Leona out for the last two weeks, but every time he was with her there was someone else around. He wanted to ask her out when they were alone, so he did something no rabbit had done before, he went looking for a predator. Today was Tuesday, no hunting team practice and Mike remembered that Leona liked to hunt on her own every Tuesday after class. As soon as the final bell rung he went looking for her, checking all of her usual hunting grounds. She wasn’t in the field so he went to the backwoods behind the school and that’s where he found her. Walking slowly up behind her, Mike made sure to not get to close. Sneaking up on the predator, even one that you know could be very dangerous. When he saw the situation he was walking into, he had to crack a smile.

“Isn’t it usually dogs that chase cats up trees?”

In the blink of an eye, Leona spun around, claws withdrawn and looking ready to murder. The nasty snarl on her face morphed instantly into a happy smile a second later. “Mike!” she cheerfully exclaimed, Mike relaxed and smiled back. When he saw the evil look on her face before she recognized him, Mike thought he was done for. It seemed that one piece of Elanor’s advice was true; predator’s moods never remain constant. Hopefully, her other advice was true too.

“Hi Leona,” Mike waved and moved closer to the non-lethal predator. Standing next to Leona, his eyes went up to her catch. “Not you’re usual prey, trying something new?”

In the branches above their heads, a large Doberman growled at Mike. “Shut it Rabbit! Why don’t you eat him cat and leave me alone, I ain’t prey! You should be eating dumb, weak rabbits like that guy!”

“Shut up!” Leona snarled, her mood returning to malicious. Her eyes narrowed on the dog holding on for dear life above her, bearing her fangs, she uttered a few words that both made Mike blissful and petrified. “Mike is not dumb or weak, he’s tougher then any dirty dog! You say anything like that again and I’ll slice you up, feed you to my teammates and mail whatever is left to your family.”

That shut the dog up and made Mike gulp nervously. This kind of behavior wasn’t strange for Leona and if what Elanor told him was true, it wasn’t strange for any predator. String emotions were a must in the animal kingdom. A good predator could be laughing and joking with their friends one second and then spot a meal and becoming bloodthirsty killers. It was common in all predators and Elanor had made it clear to Mike two weeks ago that if he couldn’t accept the beast in Elanor as well as the cheerful girl, he had better not even dream of dating her. The funny thing was that although scared, Mike found the more brutal side of Leona just as amazing as her other half. A girl that could be as sweet as candy and as tough as nails seemed like a perfect combination to Mike.

“Thanks Leona, not many people would stick up for me.” It was true, out of everyone Mike knew only Leona and maybe Leona would say anything to someone that insulted him. His prey teammates would be too afraid, his predator teammates wouldn’t care enough to say anything and his family, well, they would just run and hide.

“Forget it, what are friends for,” Leona scoffed bashfully. Her paw came down on Mike’s shoulder, lightly resting on her furry arm. Realizing how close she was to Mike, Leona pulled her paw back quickly before Mike could interpret what she was doing. Hoping to make him forget what she’d done, Leona moved onto something else. “If your wondering why I’m chasing after this freshman dog, it because coach suggested I try tracking down omnivore species. Chasing after the prey team has given me an edge in hunting smaller, less feisty prey, but I still suck at taking down the bigger guys. I figured chasing Fido up there would be good practice. Now if I could only get him down and finish my hunt. I’m not leaving until he’s inside my belly.”

Leona licked her lips, imaging the taste of dog once she got the freshman down. Most predators only hunted prey species, but Leona was a lioness, a breed known notoriously for taking down tougher prey. Elanor had explained how Lioness’s think to Mike, with hopes the information would help him. Lionesses were some of the toughest predators in the world, mostly because they were expected to bring in the daily meat for their whole family. Male lions don’t hunt, leaving all the hunting to the females. After centuries of doing all the work, Lionesses had hunting in their genes. Hunting down twice as much as most other species made Lionesses some of the most deadly predators on earth. And Mike had fallen for one.

“I find it hard to believe that you suck at anything,” Mike commented softly. “You’re one of the best natural hunters I’ve ever met.”

A blush crept onto Leona’s face and coyly she looked away. “Come on, you’re just saying that.”

Welcome to Comic Vore, GTS/GT, Shrinking, Unbirth.

From the sick and perverse mind behind Anime Vore, GTS/GT, Shrinking, Unbirth comes the newest interactive that promises to bring these fetishes right to the comics that we all love. I’ve started this interactive for two reasons, the lack of credible interactive comic vore, GTS/GT, Shrinking, or Unbirth on writing.com and my own love of the genre. I hope that more comic fans come forward and help me create a great interactive for everyone to enjoy.

There are several different sections you can choose from:

Marvel: Any comic series under the Marvel brand can go over here, from Spider-Man to Power Pack, pick a series and fetish and write about anyone from the series.

DC: The other big company. Choose a series and fetish from any of the DC Universe comic collection and write to your hearts content.

Independent Companies: There are more then just Marvel and DC coming out with awesome comics. Any comic not being printed by the big two goes here no matter how unheard of it is.

Webcomics: The only thing better then comics is free comics! Webcomics are all over the internet, available to be enjoyed by the masses. Pick any of the hundreds of thousands of webcomics and a fetish and create a story. It’s the twenty first century and webcomics are just as major as any other comic you could buy.

As for rules, keep it simple. No one sentence chapters unless you are introducing a series and try to keep spelling and grammar tight. Just remember those two tiny rules and we’ll all be happy ^_^

If you’re still a minor, leave now please. Mature warning!

Contribute, review or just read. Everyone just have fun exploring the world of comics and try to be nice. The Hulk will smash trolls.
